SU2  Version 4.1.0 (Cardinal)
Software suite for the simulation and design of aerospace systems, using unstructured grid technology

solver_adjoint_mean.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 
32 #include "../include/solver_structure.hpp"
33 
34 CAdjEulerSolver::CAdjEulerSolver(void) : CSolver() {
35 
36  /*--- Array initialization ---*/
37  Phi_Inf = NULL;
38  Sens_Mach = NULL;
39  Sens_AoA = NULL;
40  Sens_Geo = NULL;
41  Sens_Press = NULL;
42  Sens_Temp = NULL;
43  Sens_BPress = NULL;
44  iPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
45  jPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
46  Jacobian_Axisymmetric = NULL;
47  CSensitivity = NULL;
48  FlowPrimVar_i = NULL;
49  FlowPrimVar_j = NULL;
50 
51 }
52 
53 CAdjEulerSolver::CAdjEulerSolver(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) : CSolver() {
54  unsigned long iPoint, index, iVertex;
55  string text_line, mesh_filename;
56  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMarker, nLineLets;
57  ifstream restart_file;
58  string filename, AdjExt;
59  su2double dull_val, myArea_Monitored, Area, *Normal;
60  bool restart = config->GetRestart();
61  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
62  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
63  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
64  bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
65 
66  int rank = MASTER_NODE;
67 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
68  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
69 #endif
70 
71  /*--- Array initialization ---*/
72  Phi_Inf = NULL;
73  Sens_Mach = NULL;
74  Sens_AoA = NULL;
75  Sens_Geo = NULL;
76  Sens_Press = NULL;
77  Sens_Temp = NULL;
78  Sens_BPress = NULL;
79  iPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
80  jPoint_UndLapl = NULL;
81  Jacobian_Axisymmetric = NULL;
82  CSensitivity = NULL;
83  FlowPrimVar_i = NULL;
84  FlowPrimVar_j = NULL;
85 
86  /*--- Set the gamma value ---*/
87  Gamma = config->GetGamma();
88  Gamma_Minus_One = Gamma - 1.0;
89 
90  /*--- Define geometry constans in the solver structure ---*/
91  nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
92  nMarker = config->GetnMarker_All();
93  nPoint = geometry->GetnPoint();
94  nPointDomain = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
95 
96  if (compressible) { nVar = nDim + 2; }
97  if (incompressible) { nVar = nDim + 1; }
98  if (freesurface) { nVar = nDim + 2; }
99 
100  node = new CVariable*[nPoint];
101 
102  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the residual ---*/
103  Residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
104  Residual_RMS = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_RMS[iVar] = 0.0;
105  Residual_Max = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_Max[iVar] = 0.0;
106  Point_Max = new unsigned long[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Point_Max[iVar] = 0;
107  Point_Max_Coord = new su2double*[nVar];
108  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
109  Point_Max_Coord[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
110  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Point_Max_Coord[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
111  }
112  Residual_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_i[iVar] = 0.0;
113  Residual_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual_j[iVar] = 0.0;
114  Res_Conv_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Conv_i[iVar] = 0.0;
115  Res_Visc_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Visc_i[iVar] = 0.0;
116  Res_Conv_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Conv_j[iVar] = 0.0;
117  Res_Visc_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Res_Visc_j[iVar] = 0.0;
118 
119  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the solution ---*/
120  Solution = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
121  Solution_i = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution_i[iVar] = 0.0;
122  Solution_j = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution_j[iVar] = 0.0;
123 
124  /*--- Define some auxiliary arrays related to the flow solution ---*/
125  FlowPrimVar_i = new su2double[nDim+7]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim+7; iVar++) FlowPrimVar_i[iVar] = 0.0;
126  FlowPrimVar_j = new su2double[nDim+7]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim+7; iVar++) FlowPrimVar_j[iVar] = 0.0;
127 
128  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the geometry ---*/
129  Vector = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector[iDim] = 0.0;
130  Vector_i = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector_i[iDim] = 0.0;
131  Vector_j = new su2double[nDim]; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector_j[iDim] = 0.0;
132 
133  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the undivided lapalacian ---*/
134  if (config->GetKind_ConvNumScheme_AdjFlow() == SPACE_CENTERED) {
135  iPoint_UndLapl = new su2double [nPoint];
136  jPoint_UndLapl = new su2double [nPoint];
137  }
138 
139  /*--- Define some auxiliary vectors related to the geometry ---*/
140  Vector_i = new su2double[nDim]; Vector_j = new su2double[nDim];
141 
142  /*--- Point to point Jacobians. These are always defined because
143  they are also used for sensitivity calculations. ---*/
144  Jacobian_i = new su2double* [nVar];
145  Jacobian_j = new su2double* [nVar];
146  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
147  Jacobian_i[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
148  Jacobian_j[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
149  }
150 
151  LinSysSol.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
152  LinSysRes.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, 0.0);
153 
154  /*--- Jacobians and vector structures for implicit computations ---*/
155  if (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT) {
156  Jacobian_ii = new su2double* [nVar];
157  Jacobian_ij = new su2double* [nVar];
158  Jacobian_ji = new su2double* [nVar];
159  Jacobian_jj = new su2double* [nVar];
160  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
161  Jacobian_ii[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
162  Jacobian_ij[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
163  Jacobian_ji[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
164  Jacobian_jj[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
165  }
166 
167  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
168  cout << "Initialize Jacobian structure (Adjoint Euler). MG level: " << iMesh <<"." << endl;
169  Jacobian.Initialize(nPoint, nPointDomain, nVar, nVar, true, geometry, config);
170 
171  if ((config->GetKind_Linear_Solver_Prec() == LINELET) ||
172  (config->GetKind_Linear_Solver() == SMOOTHER_LINELET)) {
173  nLineLets = Jacobian.BuildLineletPreconditioner(geometry, config);
174  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) cout << "Compute linelet structure. " << nLineLets << " elements in each line (average)." << endl;
175  }
176 
177  if (axisymmetric) {
178  Jacobian_Axisymmetric = new su2double* [nVar];
179  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
180  Jacobian_Axisymmetric[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
181  }
182  } else {
183  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
184  cout << "Explicit scheme. No Jacobian structure (Adjoint Euler). MG level: " << iMesh <<"." << endl;
185  }
186 
187  /*--- Computation of gradients by least squares ---*/
188  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) {
189  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
190  Smatrix = new su2double* [nDim];
191  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
192  Smatrix[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
193  /*--- c vector := transpose(WA)*(Wb) ---*/
194  cvector = new su2double* [nVar];
195  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
196  cvector[iVar] = new su2double [nDim];
197  }
198 
199  /*--- Sensitivity definition and coefficient in all the markers ---*/
200  CSensitivity = new su2double* [nMarker];
201  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
202  CSensitivity[iMarker] = new su2double [geometry->nVertex[iMarker]];
203  }
204  Sens_Geo = new su2double[nMarker];
205  Sens_Mach = new su2double[nMarker];
206  Sens_AoA = new su2double[nMarker];
207  Sens_Press = new su2double[nMarker];
208  Sens_Temp = new su2double[nMarker];
209  Sens_BPress = new su2double[nMarker];
210 
211  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
212  Sens_Geo[iMarker] = 0.0;
213  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
214  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
215  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
216  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
217  Sens_BPress[iMarker] = 0.0;
218  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++)
219  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = 0.0;
220  }
221 
222  /*--- Adjoint flow at the inifinity, initialization stuff ---*/
223  PsiRho_Inf = 0.0; PsiE_Inf = 0.0;
224  Phi_Inf = new su2double [nDim];
225  Phi_Inf[0] = 0.0; Phi_Inf[1] = 0.0;
226  if (nDim == 3) Phi_Inf[2] = 0.0;
227 
228  /*--- If outflow objective, nonzero initialization ---*/
229  if ((config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == AVG_TOTAL_PRESSURE)){
230  su2double SoundSpeed,*vel_inf,R,vel2,vel;
231  R = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
232  vel_inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
233  vel2=0;
234  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++)
235  vel2 +=vel_inf[iDim]*vel_inf[iDim];
236  vel = pow(vel2,0.5);
237  SoundSpeed= pow(Gamma*config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND()*R, 0.5);
238  PsiE_Inf = Gamma_Minus_One*vel2/(vel2-pow(SoundSpeed,2.0))*0.5/vel;
239  PsiRho_Inf += PsiE_Inf*(2*SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed+vel2*Gamma_Minus_One)/(2.0*Gamma_Minus_One);
240  // Assumes +x flow direction
241  // Assume v.n = |v|, n = -v/|v|
242 
243  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++){
244  Phi_Inf[iDim] +=PsiE_Inf*(SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed/Gamma_Minus_One/vel2-1)*vel_inf[iDim];
245  // Assumes n in direction of v
246  Phi_Inf[iDim]+=vel_inf[iDim]/vel*(0.5);
247  }
248 
249  }
250 
251  if (!restart || (iMesh != MESH_0)) {
252  /*--- Restart the solution from infinity ---*/
253  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
254  node[iPoint] = new CAdjEulerVariable(PsiRho_Inf, Phi_Inf, PsiE_Inf, nDim, nVar, config);
255  }
256  else {
257 
258  /*--- Restart the solution from file information ---*/
259  mesh_filename = config->GetSolution_AdjFileName();
260  filename = config->GetObjFunc_Extension(mesh_filename);
261 
262  restart_file.open(filename.data(), ios::in);
263 
264  /*--- In case there is no file ---*/
265  if (restart_file.fail()) {
266  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
267  cout << "There is no adjoint restart file!! " << filename.data() << "."<< endl;
268  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
269  }
270 
271  /*--- In case this is a parallel simulation, we need to perform the
272  Global2Local index transformation first. ---*/
273  long *Global2Local;
274  Global2Local = new long[geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain()];
275  /*--- First, set all indices to a negative value by default ---*/
276  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint++) {
277  Global2Local[iPoint] = -1;
278  }
279  /*--- Now fill array with the transform values only for local points ---*/
280  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
281  Global2Local[geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex()] = iPoint;
282  }
283 
284  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
285  long iPoint_Local; unsigned long iPoint_Global = 0;
286 
287  /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
288  getline (restart_file, text_line);
289 
290  while (getline (restart_file, text_line)) {
291  istringstream point_line(text_line);
292 
293  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
294  on a different processor, the value of iPoint_Local will be -1.
295  Otherwise, the local index for this node on the current processor
296  will be returned and used to instantiate the vars. ---*/
297  iPoint_Local = Global2Local[iPoint_Global];
298  if (iPoint_Local >= 0) {
299  if (compressible) {
300  if (nDim == 2) point_line >> index >> dull_val >> dull_val >> Solution[0] >> Solution[1] >> Solution[2] >> Solution[3];
301  if (nDim == 3) point_line >> index >> dull_val >> dull_val >> dull_val >> Solution[0] >> Solution[1] >> Solution[2] >> Solution[3] >> Solution[4];
302  }
303  if (incompressible) {
304  if (nDim == 2) point_line >> index >> dull_val >> dull_val >> Solution[0] >> Solution[1] >> Solution[2];
305  if (nDim == 3) point_line >> index >> dull_val >> dull_val >> dull_val >> Solution[0] >> Solution[1] >> Solution[2] >> Solution[3];
306  }
307  if (freesurface) {
308  if (nDim == 2) point_line >> index >> dull_val >> dull_val >> dull_val >> Solution[0] >> Solution[1] >> Solution[2];
309  if (nDim == 3) point_line >> index >> dull_val >> dull_val >> dull_val >> dull_val >> Solution[0] >> Solution[1] >> Solution[2] >> Solution[3];
310  }
311  node[iPoint_Local] = new CAdjEulerVariable(Solution, nDim, nVar, config);
312  }
313  iPoint_Global++;
314  }
315 
316  /*--- Instantiate the variable class with an arbitrary solution
317  at any halo/periodic nodes. The initial solution can be arbitrary,
318  because a send/recv is performed immediately in the solver. ---*/
319  for (iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
320  node[iPoint] = new CAdjEulerVariable(Solution, nDim, nVar, config);
321  }
322 
323  /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
324  restart_file.close();
325 
326  /*--- Free memory needed for the transformation ---*/
327  delete [] Global2Local;
328  }
329 
330  /*--- Define solver parameters needed for execution of destructor ---*/
331  if (config->GetKind_ConvNumScheme_AdjFlow() == SPACE_CENTERED) space_centered = true;
332  else space_centered = false;
333 
334  /*--- Calculate area monitored for area-averaged-outflow-quantity-based objectives ---*/
335  myArea_Monitored = 0.0;
336  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==OUTFLOW_GENERALIZED || config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==AVG_TOTAL_PRESSURE ||
337  config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==AVG_OUTLET_PRESSURE){
338  for (iMarker =0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++){
339  if (config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker) == YES){
340  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
341  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
342  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
343  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
344  Area = 0.0;
345  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
346  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
347  myArea_Monitored += sqrt (Area);
348  }
349  }
350  }
351  }
352  }
353 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
354  Area_Monitored = 0.0;
355  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&myArea_Monitored, &Area_Monitored, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
356 #else
357  Area_Monitored = myArea_Monitored;
358 #endif
359 
360  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
361  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
362 
363 }
364 
365 CAdjEulerSolver::~CAdjEulerSolver(void) {
366  unsigned short iVar, iMarker;
367 
368  if (Phi_Inf != NULL) delete [] Phi_Inf;
369  if (Sens_Mach != NULL) delete [] Sens_Mach;
370  if (Sens_AoA != NULL) delete [] Sens_AoA;
371  if (Sens_Geo != NULL) delete [] Sens_Geo;
372  if (Sens_Press != NULL) delete [] Sens_Press;
373  if (Sens_Temp != NULL) delete [] Sens_Temp;
374  if (Sens_BPress != NULL) delete [] Sens_BPress;
375  if (iPoint_UndLapl != NULL) delete [] iPoint_UndLapl;
376  if (jPoint_UndLapl != NULL) delete [] jPoint_UndLapl;
377  if (FlowPrimVar_i != NULL) delete [] FlowPrimVar_i;
378  if (FlowPrimVar_j != NULL) delete [] FlowPrimVar_j;
379 
380  if (Jacobian_Axisymmetric != NULL) {
381  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
382  delete Jacobian_Axisymmetric[iVar];
383  delete [] Jacobian_Axisymmetric;
384  }
385 
386  if (CSensitivity != NULL) {
387  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
388  delete CSensitivity[iMarker];
389  delete [] CSensitivity;
390  }
391 
392 }
393 
394 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetTime_Step(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config,
395  unsigned short iMesh, unsigned long Iteration) {
396 
397  /*--- Use the flow solution to update the time step
398  * The time step depends on the characteristic velocity, which is the same
399  * for the adjoint and flow solutions, albeit in the opposite direction. ---*/
400  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->SetTime_Step(geometry, solver_container, config, iMesh, Iteration);
401 }
402 
403 
404 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
405  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
406  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
407  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi, *Buffer_Receive_U = NULL, *Buffer_Send_U = NULL;
408 
409 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
410  int send_to, receive_from;
411  MPI_Status status;
412 #endif
413 
414  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
415 
416  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
417  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
418 
419  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
420 
421 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
422  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
423  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
424 #endif
425 
426  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
427  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
428 
429  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
430  Buffer_Receive_U = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
431  Buffer_Send_U = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
432 
433  /*--- Copy the solution that should be sended ---*/
434  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
435  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
436  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
437  Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
438  }
439 
440 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
441 
442  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
443  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_U, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
444  Buffer_Receive_U, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
445 
446 #else
447 
448  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
449  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
450  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
451  Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
452  }
453 
454 #endif
455 
456  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
457  delete [] Buffer_Send_U;
458 
459  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
460  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
461 
462  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
463  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
464  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
465 
466  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
467  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
468 
469  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
470  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
471  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
472  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
473 
474  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
475  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
476  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
477  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
478  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
479  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
480  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
481 
482  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
483  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
484  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
485 
486  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
487  if (nDim == 2) {
488  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
489  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
490  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
491  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
492  }
493  else {
494  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
495  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
496  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
497  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
498  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
499  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
500  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
501  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
502  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
503  }
504 
505  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
506  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
507  node[iPoint]->SetSolution(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
508 
509  }
510 
511  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
512  delete [] Buffer_Receive_U;
513 
514  }
515 
516  }
517 
518 }
519 
520 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution_Old(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
521  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
522  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
523  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
524  *Buffer_Receive_U = NULL, *Buffer_Send_U = NULL;
525 
526 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
527  int send_to, receive_from;
528  MPI_Status status;
529 #endif
530 
531  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
532 
533  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
534  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
535 
536  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
537 
538 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
539  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
540  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
541 #endif
542 
543  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
544  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
545 
546  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
547  Buffer_Receive_U = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
548  Buffer_Send_U = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
549 
550  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
551  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
552  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
553  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
554  Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution_Old(iVar);
555  }
556 
557 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
558 
559  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
560  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_U, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
561  Buffer_Receive_U, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
562 
563 #else
564 
565  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
566  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
567  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
568  Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
569  }
570 
571 #endif
572 
573  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
574  delete [] Buffer_Send_U;
575 
576  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
577  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
578 
579  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
580  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
581  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
582 
583  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
584  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
585 
586  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
587  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
588  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
589  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
590 
591  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
592  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
593  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
594  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
595  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
596  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
597  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
598 
599  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
600  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
601  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_U[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
602 
603  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
604  if (nDim == 2) {
605  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
606  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
607  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
608  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
609  }
610  else {
611  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
612  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
613  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
614  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
615  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
616  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
617  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_U[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
618  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_U[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
619  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_U[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
620  }
621 
622  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
623  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
624  node[iPoint]->SetSolution_Old(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
625 
626  }
627 
628  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
629  delete [] Buffer_Receive_U;
630 
631  }
632 
633  }
634 }
635 
636 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution_Limiter(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
637  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
638  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
639  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
640  *Buffer_Receive_Limit = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Limit = NULL;
641 
642 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
643  int send_to, receive_from;
644  MPI_Status status;
645 #endif
646 
647  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
648 
649  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
650  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
651 
652  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
653 
654 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
655  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
656  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
657 #endif
658 
659  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
660  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
661 
662  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
663  Buffer_Receive_Limit = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
664  Buffer_Send_Limit = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
665 
666  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
667  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
668  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
669  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
670  Buffer_Send_Limit[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetLimiter(iVar);
671  }
672 
673 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
674 
675  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
676  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Limit, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
677  Buffer_Receive_Limit, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
678 
679 #else
680 
681  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
682  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
683  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
684  Buffer_Receive_Limit[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Limit[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
685  }
686 
687 #endif
688 
689  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
690  delete [] Buffer_Send_Limit;
691 
692  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
693  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
694 
695  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
696  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
697  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
698 
699  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
700  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
701 
702  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
703  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
704  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
705  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
706 
707  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
708  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
709  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
710  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
711  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
712  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
713  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
714 
715  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
716  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
717  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_Limit[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
718 
719  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
720  if (nDim == 2) {
721  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
722  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
723  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
724  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
725  }
726  else {
727  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
728  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
729  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
730  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
731  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
732  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
733  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
734  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
735  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_Limit[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
736  }
737 
738  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
739  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
740  node[iPoint]->SetLimiter(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
741 
742  }
743 
744  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
745  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Limit;
746 
747  }
748 
749  }
750 }
751 
752 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution_Gradient(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
753  unsigned short iVar, iDim, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
754  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
755  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
756  *Buffer_Receive_Gradient = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Gradient = NULL;
757 
758 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
759  int send_to, receive_from;
760  MPI_Status status;
761 #endif
762 
763  su2double **Gradient = new su2double* [nVar];
764  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
765  Gradient[iVar] = new su2double[nDim];
766 
767  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
768 
769  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
770  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
771 
772  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
773 
774 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
775  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
776  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
777 #endif
778 
779  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
780  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar*nDim; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar*nDim;
781 
782  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
783  Buffer_Receive_Gradient = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
784  Buffer_Send_Gradient = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
785 
786  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
787  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
788  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
789  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
790  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
791  Buffer_Send_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexS+iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetGradient(iVar, iDim);
792  }
793 
794 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
795 
796  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
797  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Gradient, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
798  Buffer_Receive_Gradient, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
799 #else
800 
801  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
802  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
803  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
804  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
805  Buffer_Receive_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
806  }
807 
808 #endif
809 
810  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
811  delete [] Buffer_Send_Gradient;
812 
813  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
814  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
815 
816  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
817  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
818  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
819 
820  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
821  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
822 
823  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
824  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
825  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
826  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
827 
828  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
829  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
830  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
831  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
832  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
833  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
834  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
835 
836  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
837  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
838  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
839  Gradient[iVar][iDim] = Buffer_Receive_Gradient[iDim*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
840 
841  /*--- Need to rotate the gradients for all conserved variables. ---*/
842  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
843  if (nDim == 2) {
844  Gradient[iVar][0] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
845  Gradient[iVar][1] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
846  }
847  else {
848  Gradient[iVar][0] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[2*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
849  Gradient[iVar][1] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[2*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
850  Gradient[iVar][2] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[0*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[1*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] + rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_Gradient[2*nVar*nVertexR+iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
851  }
852  }
853 
854  /*--- Store the received information ---*/
855  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
856  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
857  node[iPoint]->SetGradient(iVar, iDim, Gradient[iVar][iDim]);
858 
859  }
860 
861  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
862  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Gradient;
863 
864  }
865 
866  }
867 
868  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
869  delete [] Gradient[iVar];
870  delete [] Gradient;
871 
872 }
873 
874 
875 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Undivided_Laplacian(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
876  unsigned short iVar, iMarker, iPeriodic_Index, MarkerS, MarkerR;
877  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
878  su2double rotMatrix[3][3], *angles, theta, cosTheta, sinTheta, phi, cosPhi, sinPhi, psi, cosPsi, sinPsi,
879  *Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian = NULL;
880 
881 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
882  int send_to, receive_from;
883  MPI_Status status;
884 #endif
885 
886  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
887 
888  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
889  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
890 
891  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
892 
893 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
894  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
895  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
896 #endif
897 
898  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
899  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS*nVar; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR*nVar;
900 
901  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
902  Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
903  Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
904 
905  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
906  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
907  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
908  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
909  Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexS+iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetUndivided_Laplacian(iVar);
910  }
911 
912 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
913 
914  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
915  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
916  Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
917 #else
918 
919  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
920  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
921  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
922  Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
923  }
924 
925 #endif
926 
927  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
928  delete [] Buffer_Send_Undivided_Laplacian;
929 
930  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
931  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
932 
933  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
934  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
935  iPeriodic_Index = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetRotation_Type();
936 
937  /*--- Retrieve the supplied periodic information. ---*/
938  angles = config->GetPeriodicRotation(iPeriodic_Index);
939 
940  /*--- Store angles separately for clarity. ---*/
941  theta = angles[0]; phi = angles[1]; psi = angles[2];
942  cosTheta = cos(theta); cosPhi = cos(phi); cosPsi = cos(psi);
943  sinTheta = sin(theta); sinPhi = sin(phi); sinPsi = sin(psi);
944 
945  /*--- Compute the rotation matrix. Note that the implicit
946  ordering is rotation about the x-axis, y-axis,
947  then z-axis. Note that this is the transpose of the matrix
948  used during the preprocessing stage. ---*/
949  rotMatrix[0][0] = cosPhi*cosPsi; rotMatrix[1][0] = sinTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi - cosTheta*sinPsi; rotMatrix[2][0] = cosTheta*sinPhi*cosPsi + sinTheta*sinPsi;
950  rotMatrix[0][1] = cosPhi*sinPsi; rotMatrix[1][1] = sinTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi + cosTheta*cosPsi; rotMatrix[2][1] = cosTheta*sinPhi*sinPsi - sinTheta*cosPsi;
951  rotMatrix[0][2] = -sinPhi; rotMatrix[1][2] = sinTheta*cosPhi; rotMatrix[2][2] = cosTheta*cosPhi;
952 
953  /*--- Copy conserved variables before performing transformation. ---*/
954  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
955  Solution[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[iVar*nVertexR+iVertex];
956 
957  /*--- Rotate the momentum components. ---*/
958  if (nDim == 2) {
959  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
960  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
961  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
962  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex];
963  }
964  else {
965  Solution[1] = rotMatrix[0][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
966  rotMatrix[0][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
967  rotMatrix[0][2]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
968  Solution[2] = rotMatrix[1][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
969  rotMatrix[1][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
970  rotMatrix[1][2]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
971  Solution[3] = rotMatrix[2][0]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[1*nVertexR+iVertex] +
972  rotMatrix[2][1]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[2*nVertexR+iVertex] +
973  rotMatrix[2][2]*Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian[3*nVertexR+iVertex];
974  }
975 
976  /*--- Copy transformed conserved variables back into buffer. ---*/
977  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
978  node[iPoint]->SetUndivided_Laplacian(iVar, Solution[iVar]);
979 
980  }
981 
982  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
983  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Undivided_Laplacian;
984 
985  }
986 
987  }
988 
989 }
990 
991 void CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Dissipation_Switch(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
992  unsigned short iMarker, MarkerS, MarkerR;
993  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, nVertexS, nVertexR, nBufferS_Vector, nBufferR_Vector;
994  su2double *Buffer_Receive_Lambda = NULL, *Buffer_Send_Lambda = NULL;
995 
996 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
997  int send_to, receive_from;
998  MPI_Status status;
999 #endif
1000 
1001  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
1002 
1003  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SEND_RECEIVE) &&
1004  (config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(iMarker) > 0)) {
1005 
1006  MarkerS = iMarker; MarkerR = iMarker+1;
1007 
1008 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1009  send_to = config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerS)-1;
1010  receive_from = abs(config->GetMarker_All_SendRecv(MarkerR))-1;
1011 #endif
1012 
1013  nVertexS = geometry->nVertex[MarkerS]; nVertexR = geometry->nVertex[MarkerR];
1014  nBufferS_Vector = nVertexS; nBufferR_Vector = nVertexR;
1015 
1016  /*--- Allocate Receive and send buffers ---*/
1017  Buffer_Receive_Lambda = new su2double [nBufferR_Vector];
1018  Buffer_Send_Lambda = new su2double[nBufferS_Vector];
1019 
1020  /*--- Copy the solution old that should be sended ---*/
1021  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexS; iVertex++) {
1022  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerS][iVertex]->GetNode();
1023  Buffer_Send_Lambda[iVertex] = node[iPoint]->GetSensor();
1024  }
1025 
1026 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1027 
1028  /*--- Send/Receive information using Sendrecv ---*/
1029  SU2_MPI::Sendrecv(Buffer_Send_Lambda, nBufferS_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, send_to, 0,
1030  Buffer_Receive_Lambda, nBufferR_Vector, MPI_DOUBLE, receive_from, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
1031 #else
1032 
1033  /*--- Receive information without MPI ---*/
1034  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
1035  Buffer_Receive_Lambda[iVertex] = Buffer_Send_Lambda[iVertex];
1036  }
1037 
1038 #endif
1039 
1040  /*--- Deallocate send buffer ---*/
1041  delete [] Buffer_Send_Lambda;
1042 
1043  /*--- Do the coordinate transformation ---*/
1044  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertexR; iVertex++) {
1045 
1046  /*--- Find point and its type of transformation ---*/
1047  iPoint = geometry->vertex[MarkerR][iVertex]->GetNode();
1048  node[iPoint]->SetSensor(Buffer_Receive_Lambda[iVertex]);
1049 
1050  }
1051 
1052  /*--- Deallocate receive buffer ---*/
1053  delete [] Buffer_Receive_Lambda;
1054 
1055  }
1056 
1057  }
1058 }
1059 
1060 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetForceProj_Vector(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
1061 
1062  su2double *ForceProj_Vector, x = 0.0, y = 0.0, z = 0.0, *Normal, CD, CL, Cp, CpTarget,
1063  CT, CQ, x_origin, y_origin, z_origin, WDrag, Area, invCD, CLCD2, invCQ, CTRCQ2;
1064  unsigned short iMarker;
1065  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
1066 
1067  int rank = MASTER_NODE;
1068 
1069 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1070  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
1071 #endif
1072 
1073  su2double Alpha = (config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER)/180.0;
1074  su2double Beta = (config->GetAoS()*PI_NUMBER)/180.0;
1075  su2double RefLengthMoment = config->GetRefLengthMoment();
1076  su2double *RefOriginMoment = config->GetRefOriginMoment(0);
1077 
1078  ForceProj_Vector = new su2double[nDim];
1079 
1080  /*--- Compute coefficients needed for objective function evaluation. ---*/
1081 
1082  CD = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CDrag();
1083  CL = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CLift();
1084  CT = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CT();
1085  CQ = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_CQ();
1086  invCD = 1.0/CD; CLCD2 = CL/(CD*CD);
1087  invCQ = 1.0/CQ; CTRCQ2 = CT/(RefLengthMoment*CQ*CQ);
1088 
1089  x_origin = RefOriginMoment[0]; y_origin = RefOriginMoment[1]; z_origin = RefOriginMoment[2];
1090 
1091  /*--- Evaluate the boundary condition coefficients. ---*/
1092 
1093  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
1094 
1095  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE) &&
1096  (config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker) == YES))
1097 
1098  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1099 
1100  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1101 
1102  x = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(0);
1103  y = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(1);
1104  if (nDim == 3) z = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(2);
1105 
1106  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
1107  switch (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()) {
1108  case DRAG_COEFFICIENT :
1109  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Alpha); }
1110  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta); ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Beta); ForceProj_Vector[2] = sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta); }
1111  break;
1112  case LIFT_COEFFICIENT :
1113  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = -sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] = cos(Alpha); }
1114  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = -sin(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] = cos(Alpha); }
1115  break;
1116  case SIDEFORCE_COEFFICIENT :
1117  if ((nDim == 2) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) { cout << "This functional is not possible in 2D!!" << endl;
1118  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1119  }
1120  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = -sin(Beta) * cos(Alpha); ForceProj_Vector[1] = cos(Beta); ForceProj_Vector[2] = -sin(Beta) * sin(Alpha); }
1121  break;
1122  case INVERSE_DESIGN_PRESSURE :
1123  Cp = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCPressure(iMarker, iVertex);
1124  CpTarget = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCPressureTarget(iMarker, iVertex);
1125  Area = sqrt(Normal[0]*Normal[0] + Normal[1]*Normal[1]);
1126  if (nDim == 3) Area = sqrt(Normal[0]*Normal[0] + Normal[1]*Normal[1] + Normal[2]*Normal[2]);
1127  ForceProj_Vector[0] = -2.0*(Cp-CpTarget)*Normal[0]/Area; ForceProj_Vector[1] = -2.0*(Cp-CpTarget)*Normal[1]/Area;
1128  if (nDim == 3) ForceProj_Vector[2] = -2.0*(Cp-CpTarget)*Normal[2]/Area;
1129  break;
1130  case MOMENT_X_COEFFICIENT :
1131  if ((nDim == 2) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) { cout << "This functional is not possible in 2D!!" << endl; exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
1132  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = -(z - z_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[2] = (y - y_origin)/RefLengthMoment; }
1133  break;
1134  case MOMENT_Y_COEFFICIENT :
1135  if ((nDim == 2) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) { cout << "This functional is not possible in 2D!!" << endl; exit(EXIT_FAILURE); }
1136  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = (z - z_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] = -(x - x_origin)/RefLengthMoment; }
1137  break;
1138  case MOMENT_Z_COEFFICIENT :
1139  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = -(y - y_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[1] = (x - x_origin)/RefLengthMoment; }
1140  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = -(y - y_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[1] = (x - x_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[2] = 0; }
1141  break;
1142  case EFFICIENCY :
1143  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = -(invCD*sin(Alpha)+CLCD2*cos(Alpha)); ForceProj_Vector[1] = (invCD*cos(Alpha)-CLCD2*sin(Alpha)); }
1144  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = -(invCD*sin(Alpha)+CLCD2*cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)); ForceProj_Vector[1] = -CLCD2*sin(Beta); ForceProj_Vector[2] = (invCD*cos(Alpha)-CLCD2*sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)); }
1145  break;
1146  case EQUIVALENT_AREA :
1147  WDrag = config->GetWeightCd();
1148  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Alpha)*WDrag; }
1149  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[2] = sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; }
1150  break;
1151  case NEARFIELD_PRESSURE :
1152  WDrag = config->GetWeightCd();
1153  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Alpha)*WDrag; }
1154  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = cos(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[1] = sin(Beta)*WDrag; ForceProj_Vector[2] = sin(Alpha)*cos(Beta)*WDrag; }
1155  break;
1156  case FORCE_X_COEFFICIENT :
1157  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 1.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; }
1158  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 1.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] = 0.0; }
1159  break;
1160  case FORCE_Y_COEFFICIENT :
1161  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 1.0; }
1162  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 1.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] = 0.0; }
1163  break;
1164  case FORCE_Z_COEFFICIENT :
1165  if ((nDim == 2) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {cout << "This functional is not possible in 2D!!" << endl;
1166  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1167  }
1168  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] = 1.0; }
1169  break;
1170  case THRUST_COEFFICIENT :
1171  if ((nDim == 2) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {cout << "This functional is not possible in 2D!!" << endl;
1172  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1173  }
1174  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] = 1.0; }
1175  break;
1176  case TORQUE_COEFFICIENT :
1177  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = (y - y_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[1] = -(x - x_origin)/RefLengthMoment; }
1178  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = (y - y_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[1] = -(x - x_origin)/RefLengthMoment; ForceProj_Vector[2] = 0; }
1179  break;
1180  case FIGURE_OF_MERIT :
1181  if ((nDim == 2) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {cout << "This functional is not possible in 2D!!" << endl;
1182  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1183  }
1184  if (nDim == 3) {
1185  ForceProj_Vector[0] = -invCQ;
1186  ForceProj_Vector[1] = -CTRCQ2*(z - z_origin);
1187  ForceProj_Vector[2] = CTRCQ2*(y - y_origin);
1188  }
1189  break;
1190  default :
1191  if (nDim == 2) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; }
1192  if (nDim == 3) { ForceProj_Vector[0] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[1] = 0.0; ForceProj_Vector[2] = 0.0; }
1193  break;
1194  }
1195 
1196  /*--- Store the force projection vector at this node ---*/
1197 
1198  node[iPoint]->SetForceProj_Vector(ForceProj_Vector);
1199 
1200  }
1201 
1202  delete [] ForceProj_Vector;
1203 
1204 }
1205 
1206 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetIntBoundary_Jump(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
1207  unsigned short iMarker, iVar, jVar, kVar, iDim, jDim, iIndex;
1208  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, iPointNearField, nPointNearField = 0;
1209  su2double factor = 1.0, AngleDouble, data, aux, *IntBound_Vector, *coord, *FlowSolution, WeightSB, MinDist = 1E6, Dist, DerivativeOF = 0.0, *Normal, Area, UnitNormal[3], velocity[3], Energy, Rho, sqvel, proj_vel, phi, a1, a2;
1210  su2double **A, **M, **AM, *b;
1211  short AngleInt = 0, IndexNF_inv[180], iColumn;
1212  ifstream index_file;
1213  string text_line;
1214  vector<vector<su2double> > NearFieldWeight;
1215  vector<su2double> CoordNF;
1216  vector<short> IndexNF;
1217 
1218  IntBound_Vector = new su2double [nVar];
1219 
1220  /*--- Allocate vectors and matrices ---*/
1221 
1222  b = new su2double [nVar];
1223  A = new su2double* [nVar];
1224  M = new su2double* [nVar];
1225  AM = new su2double* [nVar];
1226  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1227  A[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
1228  M[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
1229  AM[iVar] = new su2double [nVar];
1230  }
1231 
1232  /*--- If equivalent area objective function, read the value of
1233  the derivative from a file, this is a preprocess of the direct solution ---*/
1234 
1235  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA) {
1236 
1237  /*--- Read derivative of the objective function at the NearField from file ---*/
1238  index_file.open("WeightNF.dat", ios::in);
1239  if (index_file.fail()) {
1240  cout << "There is no Weight Nearfield Pressure file (WeightNF.dat)." << endl;
1241  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1242  }
1243 
1244  nPointNearField = 0;
1245 
1246  while (index_file) {
1247  string line;
1248  getline(index_file, line);
1249  istringstream is(line);
1250 
1251  /*--- The first row provides the azimuthal angle ---*/
1252 
1253  if (nPointNearField == 0) {
1254  is >> data; // The first column is related with the coordinate
1255  while (is.good()) { is >> data; IndexNF.push_back(SU2_TYPE::Int(data)); }
1256  }
1257  else {
1258  is >> data; CoordNF.push_back(data); // The first column is the point coordinate
1259  vector<su2double> row;
1260  while (is.good()) { is >> data; row.push_back(data); }
1261  NearFieldWeight.push_back(row);
1262  }
1263  nPointNearField++;
1264  }
1265 
1266  /*--- Note tha the first row is the azimuthal angle ---*/
1267 
1268  nPointNearField = nPointNearField - 1;
1269 
1270  for (AngleInt = 0; AngleInt < 180; AngleInt++)
1271  IndexNF_inv[AngleInt] = -1;
1272 
1273  if (IndexNF.size() <= 180) {
1274  for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < IndexNF.size(); iIndex++)
1275  IndexNF_inv[IndexNF[iIndex]] = iIndex;
1276  }
1277  else {
1278  #ifndef HAVE_MPI
1279  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1280  #else
1281  MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1282  MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD, 1);
1283  MPI_Finalize();
1284  #endif
1285  }
1286 
1287  }
1288 
1289  /*--- Compute the jump on the adjoint variables for the upper and the lower side ---*/
1290 
1291  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
1292 
1293  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY)
1294 
1295  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
1296 
1297  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
1298  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
1299 
1300  Area = 0.0;
1301  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
1302  Area = sqrt (Area);
1303 
1304  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
1305  UnitNormal[iDim] = Normal[iDim]/Area;
1306 
1307  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
1308 
1309  coord = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
1310  DerivativeOF = 0.0;
1311 
1312  /*--- Just in case the functional depend also on the surface pressure ---*/
1313 
1314  WeightSB = 1.0-config->GetWeightCd();
1315 
1316  su2double AoA, XcoordRot = 0.0, YcoordRot = 0.0, ZcoordRot = 0.0;
1317 
1318  if (nDim == 2) XcoordRot = coord[0];
1319  if (nDim == 3) {
1320 
1321  /*--- Rotate the nearfield cylinder ---*/
1322 
1323  AoA = -(config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0);
1324  XcoordRot = coord[0]*cos(AoA) - coord[2]*sin(AoA);
1325  YcoordRot = coord[1];
1326  ZcoordRot = coord[0]*sin(AoA) + coord[2]*cos(AoA);
1327  }
1328 
1329  switch (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()) {
1330  case EQUIVALENT_AREA :
1331 
1332  if (nDim == 2) AngleInt = 0;
1333 
1334  if (nDim == 3) {
1335 
1336  /*--- Compute the azimuthal angle of the iPoint ---*/
1337 
1338  AngleDouble = fabs(atan(-YcoordRot/ZcoordRot)*180.0/PI_NUMBER);
1339 
1340  /*--- Fix an azimuthal line due to misalignments of the near-field ---*/
1341 
1342  su2double FixAzimuthalLine = config->GetFixAzimuthalLine();
1343 
1344  if ((AngleDouble >= FixAzimuthalLine - 0.1) && (AngleDouble <= FixAzimuthalLine + 0.1)) AngleDouble = FixAzimuthalLine - 0.1;
1345 
1346  AngleInt = SU2_TYPE::Short(floor(AngleDouble + 0.5));
1347  if (AngleInt < 0) AngleInt = 180 + AngleInt;
1348 
1349  }
1350 
1351  if (AngleInt <= 60) {
1352  iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt];
1353 
1354  /*--- An azimuthal angle is not defined... this happens with MG levels ---*/
1355 
1356  if (iColumn < 0.0) {
1357  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+1] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+1]; goto end; }
1358  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-1] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-1]; goto end; }
1359  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+2] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+2]; goto end; }
1360  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-2] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-2]; goto end; }
1361  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+3] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+3]; goto end; }
1362  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-3] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-3]; goto end; }
1363  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+4] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt+4]; goto end; }
1364  if (IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-4] > 0) { iColumn = IndexNF_inv[AngleInt-4]; goto end; }
1365  }
1366 
1367  end:
1368 
1369  if (iColumn < 0.0) { cout <<" An azimuthal angle is not defined..." << endl; }
1370 
1371  /*--- Find the value of the weight in the table, using the azimuthal angle ---*/
1372 
1373  MinDist = 1E6;
1374  for (iPointNearField = 0; iPointNearField < nPointNearField; iPointNearField++) {
1375  Dist = fabs(CoordNF[iPointNearField] - XcoordRot);
1376  if (Dist <= MinDist) {
1377  MinDist = Dist;
1378  DerivativeOF = factor*WeightSB*NearFieldWeight[iPointNearField][iColumn];
1379  }
1380  }
1381  }
1382  else DerivativeOF = 0.0;
1383 
1384  if ((MinDist > 1E-6) || (coord[nDim-1] > 0.0)) DerivativeOF = 0.0;
1385 
1386  break;
1387 
1388  case NEARFIELD_PRESSURE :
1389 
1390  DerivativeOF = factor*WeightSB*(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure()
1391  - solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetPressure_Inf());
1392 
1393  break;
1394 
1395  }
1396 
1397  /*--- Compute the jump of the adjoint variables (2D, and 3D problems) --*/
1398 
1399  FlowSolution = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
1400 
1401  Rho = FlowSolution[0];
1402  Energy = FlowSolution[nVar-1]/FlowSolution[0];
1403 
1404  sqvel = 0.0; proj_vel = 0.0;
1405  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
1406  velocity[iDim] = FlowSolution[iDim+1]/FlowSolution[0];
1407  sqvel += velocity[iDim]*velocity[iDim];
1408  proj_vel += velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
1409  }
1410 
1411  if (nDim == 2) {
1412 
1413  /*--- Compute the projected Jacobian ---*/
1414 
1415  A[0][0] = 0.0; A[0][1] = 0.0; A[0][2] = 1.0; A[0][3] = 0.0;
1416  A[1][0] = -velocity[0]*velocity[1]; A[1][1] = velocity[1]; A[1][2] = velocity[0]; A[1][3] = 0.0;
1417  A[2][0] = 0.5*(Gamma-3.0)*velocity[1]*velocity[1]+0.5*Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[0]*velocity[0]; A[2][1] = -Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[0];
1418  A[2][2] = (3.0-Gamma)*velocity[1]; A[2][3] = Gamma_Minus_One; A[3][0] = -Gamma*velocity[1]*Energy+Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[1]*sqvel;
1419  A[3][1] = -Gamma_Minus_One*velocity[0]*velocity[1]; A[3][2] = Gamma*Energy-0.5*Gamma_Minus_One*(velocity[0]*velocity[0]+3.0*velocity[1]*velocity[1]); A[3][3] = Gamma*velocity[1];
1420 
1421  /*--- Compute the transformation matrix ---*/
1422 
1423  M[0][0] = 1.0; M[0][1] = 0.0; M[0][2] = 0.0; M[0][3] = 0.0;
1424  M[1][0] = velocity[0]; M[1][1] = Rho; M[1][2] = 0.0; M[1][3] = 0.0;
1425  M[2][0] = velocity[1]; M[2][1] = 0.0; M[2][2] = Rho; M[2][3] = 0.0;
1426  M[3][0] = 0.5*sqvel; M[3][1] = Rho*velocity[0]; M[3][2] = Rho*velocity[1]; M[3][3] = 1.0/Gamma_Minus_One;
1427 
1428  /*--- Create the soruce term (AM)^T X = b ---*/
1429 
1430  b[0] = 0.0; b[1] = 0.0; b[2] = 0.0; b[3] = DerivativeOF;
1431 
1432  }
1433 
1434  if (nDim == 3) {
1435 
1436 
1437  /*--- Compute the projected Jacobian ---*/
1438 
1439  phi = 0.5*Gamma_Minus_One*sqvel;
1440  a1 = Gamma*Energy-phi; a2 = Gamma-1.0;
1441 
1442  A[0][0] = 0.0;
1443  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) A[0][iDim+1] = UnitNormal[iDim];
1444  A[0][nDim+1] = 0.0;
1445 
1446  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
1447  A[iDim+1][0] = (UnitNormal[iDim]*phi - velocity[iDim]*proj_vel);
1448  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
1449  A[iDim+1][jDim+1] = (UnitNormal[jDim]*velocity[iDim]-a2*UnitNormal[iDim]*velocity[jDim]);
1450  A[iDim+1][iDim+1] += proj_vel;
1451  A[iDim+1][nDim+1] = a2*UnitNormal[iDim];
1452  }
1453 
1454  A[nDim+1][0] = proj_vel*(phi-a1);
1455  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
1456  A[nDim+1][iDim+1] = (UnitNormal[iDim]*a1-a2*velocity[iDim]*proj_vel);
1457  A[nDim+1][nDim+1] = Gamma*proj_vel;
1458 
1459  /*--- Compute the transformation matrix ---*/
1460 
1461  M[0][0] = 1.0; M[0][1] = 0.0; M[0][2] = 0.0; M[0][3] = 0.0; M[0][4] = 0.0;
1462  M[1][0] = velocity[0]; M[1][1] = Rho; M[1][2] = 0.0; M[1][3] = 0.0; M[1][4] = 0.0;
1463  M[2][0] = velocity[1]; M[2][1] = 0.0; M[2][2] = Rho; M[2][3] = 0.0; M[2][4] = 0.0;
1464  M[3][0] = velocity[2]; M[3][1] = 0.0; M[3][2] = 0.0; M[3][3] = Rho; M[3][4] = 0.0;
1465  M[4][0] = 0.5*sqvel; M[4][1] = Rho*velocity[0]; M[4][2] = Rho*velocity[1];
1466  M[4][3] = Rho*velocity[2]; M[4][4] = 1.0/Gamma_Minus_One;
1467 
1468  /*--- Create the soruce term (AM)^T X = b ---*/
1469 
1470  b[0] = 0.0; b[1] = 0.0; b[2] = 0.0; b[3] = 0.0; b[4] = DerivativeOF;
1471 
1472  }
1473 
1474  /*--- Compute A times M ---*/
1475 
1476  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1477  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar++) {
1478  aux = 0.0;
1479  for (kVar = 0; kVar < nVar; kVar++)
1480  aux += A[iVar][kVar]*M[kVar][jVar];
1481  AM[iVar][jVar] = aux;
1482  }
1483 
1484  /*--- Compute the transpose matrix ---*/
1485 
1486  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1487  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar++)
1488  A[iVar][jVar] = AM[jVar][iVar];
1489 
1490  /*--- Solve the linear system using a LU descomposition --*/
1491 
1492  Gauss_Elimination(A, b, nVar);
1493 
1494  /*--- Update the internal boundary jump --*/
1495 
1496  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1497  IntBound_Vector[iVar] = b[iVar];
1498 
1499  node[iPoint]->SetIntBoundary_Jump(IntBound_Vector);
1500 
1501  }
1502  }
1503 
1504  delete [] IntBound_Vector;
1505 
1506  /*--- Deallocate the linear system ---*/
1507 
1508  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1509  delete [] A[iVar];
1510  delete [] M[iVar];
1511  delete [] AM[iVar];
1512  }
1513  delete [] A;
1514  delete [] M;
1515  delete [] AM;
1516  delete [] b;
1517 
1518 }
1519 
1520 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetInitialCondition(CGeometry **geometry, CSolver ***solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned long ExtIter) {
1521  unsigned long iPoint, Point_Fine;
1522  unsigned short iMesh, iChildren, iVar;
1523  su2double LevelSet, Area_Children, Area_Parent, LevelSet_Fine, *Solution, *Solution_Fine;
1524 
1525  bool restart = config->GetRestart();
1526  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
1527  bool dual_time = ((config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_1ST) ||
1528  (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == DT_STEPPING_2ND));
1529 
1530  if (freesurface) {
1531 
1532  for (iMesh = 0; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
1533 
1534  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
1535 
1536  /*--- Set initial boundary condition at iter 0 ---*/
1537  if ((ExtIter == 0) && (!restart)) {
1538 
1539  /*--- Compute the adjoint level set value in all the MG levels ---*/
1540  if (iMesh == MESH_0) {
1541  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->SetSolution(nDim+1, 0.0);
1542  }
1543  else {
1544  Area_Parent = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
1545  LevelSet = 0.0;
1546  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++) {
1547  Point_Fine = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
1548  Area_Children = geometry[iMesh-1]->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
1549  LevelSet_Fine = solver_container[iMesh-1][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[Point_Fine]->GetSolution(nDim+1);
1550  LevelSet += LevelSet_Fine*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
1551  }
1552  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->SetSolution(nDim+1, LevelSet);
1553  }
1554 
1555  /*--- Compute the flow solution using the level set value. ---*/
1556  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
1557  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->SetSolution(iVar, 0.0);
1558 
1559  }
1560  }
1561 
1562  /*--- Set the MPI communication ---*/
1563  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->Set_MPI_Solution(geometry[iMesh], config);
1564 
1565  }
1566 
1567  }
1568 
1569  /*--- If restart solution, then interpolate the flow solution to
1570  all the multigrid levels, this is important with the dual time strategy ---*/
1571  if (restart) {
1572  Solution = new su2double[nVar];
1573  for (iMesh = 1; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
1574  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
1575  Area_Parent = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
1576  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Solution[iVar] = 0.0;
1577  for (iChildren = 0; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetnChildren_CV(); iChildren++) {
1578  Point_Fine = geometry[iMesh]->node[iPoint]->GetChildren_CV(iChildren);
1579  Area_Children = geometry[iMesh-1]->node[Point_Fine]->GetVolume();
1580  Solution_Fine = solver_container[iMesh-1][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[Point_Fine]->GetSolution();
1581  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1582  Solution[iVar] += Solution_Fine[iVar]*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
1583  }
1584  }
1585  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->SetSolution(Solution);
1586 
1587  }
1588  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->Set_MPI_Solution(geometry[iMesh], config);
1589  }
1590  delete [] Solution;
1591  }
1592 
1593  /*--- The value of the solution for the first iteration of the dual time ---*/
1594  for (iMesh = 0; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
1595  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
1596  if ((ExtIter == 0) && (dual_time)) {
1597  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->Set_Solution_time_n();
1598  solver_container[iMesh][ADJFLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->Set_Solution_time_n1();
1599  }
1600  }
1601  }
1602 
1603 }
1604 
1605 void CAdjEulerSolver::Preprocessing(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep, unsigned short RunTime_EqSystem, bool Output) {
1606 
1607  unsigned long iPoint, ErrorCounter = 0;
1608  su2double SharpEdge_Distance;
1609  bool RightSol = true;
1610 
1611 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1612  int rank;
1613  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
1614 #endif
1615 
1616  /*--- Retrieve information about the spatial and temporal integration for the
1617  adjoint equations (note that the flow problem may use different methods). ---*/
1618 
1619  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
1620  bool second_order = ((config->GetSpatialOrder_AdjFlow() == SECOND_ORDER) || (config->GetSpatialOrder_AdjFlow() == SECOND_ORDER_LIMITER));
1621  bool limiter = (config->GetSpatialOrder_AdjFlow() == SECOND_ORDER_LIMITER);
1622  bool center = (config->GetKind_ConvNumScheme_AdjFlow() == SPACE_CENTERED);
1623  bool center_jst = (config->GetKind_Centered_AdjFlow() == JST);
1624  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
1625  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
1626  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
1627  bool engine = ((config->GetnMarker_EngineInflow() != 0) || (config->GetnMarker_EngineBleed() != 0) || (config->GetnMarker_EngineExhaust() != 0));
1628 
1629  /*--- Compute nacelle inflow and exhaust properties ---*/
1630 
1631  if (engine) { GetEngine_Properties(geometry, config, iMesh, Output); }
1632 
1633  /*--- Residual initialization ---*/
1634 
1635  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint ++) {
1636 
1637  /*--- Get the distance form a sharp edge ---*/
1638 
1639  SharpEdge_Distance = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance();
1640 
1641  /*--- Initialize the non-physical points vector ---*/
1642 
1643  node[iPoint]->SetNon_Physical(false);
1644 
1645  /*--- Set the primitive variables incompressible and compressible
1646  adjoint variables ---*/
1647 
1648  if (compressible) RightSol = node[iPoint]->SetPrimVar_Compressible(SharpEdge_Distance, false, config);
1649  if (incompressible) RightSol = node[iPoint]->SetPrimVar_Incompressible(SharpEdge_Distance, false, config);
1650  if (freesurface) RightSol = node[iPoint]->SetPrimVar_FreeSurface(SharpEdge_Distance, false, config);
1651  if (!RightSol) { node[iPoint]->SetNon_Physical(true); ErrorCounter++; }
1652 
1653  /*--- Initialize the convective residual vector ---*/
1654 
1655  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint);
1656 
1657  }
1658 
1659 
1660  if ((second_order) && (iMesh == MESH_0)) {
1661 
1662  /*--- Compute gradients for upwind second-order reconstruction ---*/
1663 
1664  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
1665  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
1666 
1667  /*--- Limiter computation ---*/
1668 
1669  if (limiter) SetSolution_Limiter(geometry, config);
1670 
1671  }
1672 
1673  /*--- Artificial dissipation for centered schemes ---*/
1674 
1675  if (center) {
1676  if ((center_jst) && (iMesh == MESH_0)) {
1677  SetDissipation_Switch(geometry, config);
1678  SetUndivided_Laplacian(geometry, config);
1679  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == GREEN_GAUSS) SetSolution_Gradient_GG(geometry, config);
1680  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == WEIGHTED_LEAST_SQUARES) SetSolution_Gradient_LS(geometry, config);
1681  }
1682  }
1683 
1684  /*--- Initialize the Jacobian for implicit integration ---*/
1685 
1686  if (implicit) Jacobian.SetValZero();
1687 
1688  /*--- Error message ---*/
1689 
1690  if (config->GetConsole_Output_Verb() == VERB_HIGH) {
1691 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
1692  unsigned long MyErrorCounter = ErrorCounter; ErrorCounter = 0;
1693  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyErrorCounter, &ErrorCounter, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
1694 #endif
1695  if (iMesh == MESH_0) config->SetNonphysical_Points(ErrorCounter);
1696  }
1697 
1698 }
1699 
1700 void CAdjEulerSolver::Centered_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
1701  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, unsigned short iRKStep) {
1702 
1703  unsigned long iEdge, iPoint, jPoint;
1704 
1705  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
1706  bool second_order = ((config->GetKind_Centered_AdjFlow() == JST) && (iMesh == MESH_0));
1707  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
1708  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
1709  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
1710  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
1711 
1712  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
1713 
1714  /*--- Points in edge, normal, and neighbors---*/
1715 
1716  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
1717  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
1718  numerics->SetNormal(geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal());
1719  numerics->SetNeighbor(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnNeighbor(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetnNeighbor());
1720 
1721  /*--- Adjoint variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
1722 
1723  numerics->SetAdjointVar(node[iPoint]->GetSolution(), node[jPoint]->GetSolution());
1724 
1725  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
1726 
1727  numerics->SetConservative(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(),
1728  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetSolution());
1729 
1730  if (compressible) {
1731  numerics->SetSoundSpeed(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSoundSpeed(),
1732  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetSoundSpeed());
1733  numerics->SetEnthalpy(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy(),
1734  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetEnthalpy());
1735  }
1736  if (incompressible || freesurface) {
1737  numerics->SetDensityInc(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDensityInc(), solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetDensityInc());
1738  numerics->SetBetaInc2(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetBetaInc2(), solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetBetaInc2());
1739  numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord());
1740  }
1741 
1742  numerics->SetLambda(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLambda(),
1743  solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetLambda());
1744 
1745  if (second_order) {
1746  numerics->SetUndivided_Laplacian(node[iPoint]->GetUndivided_Laplacian(), node[jPoint]->GetUndivided_Laplacian());
1747  numerics->SetSensor(node[iPoint]->GetSensor(), node[jPoint]->GetSensor());
1748  }
1749 
1750  /*--- Mesh motion ---*/
1751 
1752  if (grid_movement) {
1753  numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel());
1754  }
1755 
1756  /*--- Compute residuals ---*/
1757 
1758  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Visc_i, Res_Conv_j, Res_Visc_j,
1759  Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
1760 
1761  /*--- Update convective and artificial dissipation residuals ---*/
1762 
1763  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
1764  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Res_Conv_j);
1765  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Visc_i);
1766  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Res_Visc_j);
1767 
1768  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
1769 
1770  if (implicit) {
1771  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
1772  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_ij);
1773  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ji);
1774  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_jj);
1775  }
1776 
1777  }
1778 }
1779 
1780 
1781 void CAdjEulerSolver::Upwind_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
1782 
1783  su2double **Gradient_i, **Gradient_j, Project_Grad_i, Project_Grad_j, *Limiter_i = NULL,
1784  *Limiter_j = NULL, *Psi_i = NULL, *Psi_j = NULL, *V_i, *V_j, Non_Physical = 1.0;
1785  unsigned long iEdge, iPoint, jPoint;
1786  unsigned short iDim, iVar;
1787 
1788  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
1789  bool second_order = (((config->GetSpatialOrder_AdjFlow() == SECOND_ORDER) || (config->GetSpatialOrder_AdjFlow() == SECOND_ORDER_LIMITER)) && (iMesh == MESH_0));
1790  bool limiter = (config->GetSpatialOrder_AdjFlow() == SECOND_ORDER_LIMITER);
1791  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
1792 
1793  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
1794 
1795  /*--- Points in edge and normal vectors ---*/
1796 
1797  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
1798  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
1799  numerics->SetNormal(geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal());
1800 
1801  /*--- Adjoint variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
1802 
1803  Psi_i = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
1804  Psi_j = node[jPoint]->GetSolution();
1805  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
1806 
1807  /*--- Primitive variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
1808 
1809  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
1810  V_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[jPoint]->GetPrimitive();
1811  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_j);
1812 
1813  /*--- Grid velocities for dynamic meshes ---*/
1814 
1815  if (grid_movement) {
1816  numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel());
1817  }
1818 
1819  /*--- High order reconstruction using MUSCL strategy ---*/
1820 
1821  if (second_order) {
1822 
1823  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
1824  Vector_i[iDim] = 0.5*(geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim));
1825  Vector_j[iDim] = 0.5*(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(iDim) - geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord(iDim));
1826  }
1827 
1828  /*--- Adjoint variables using gradient reconstruction and limiters ---*/
1829 
1830  Gradient_i = node[iPoint]->GetGradient(); Gradient_j = node[jPoint]->GetGradient();
1831  if (limiter) { Limiter_i = node[iPoint]->GetLimiter(); Limiter_j = node[jPoint]->GetLimiter(); }
1832 
1833  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1834  Project_Grad_i = 0; Project_Grad_j = 0;
1835  Non_Physical = node[iPoint]->GetNon_Physical()*node[jPoint]->GetNon_Physical();
1836  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
1837  Project_Grad_i += Vector_i[iDim]*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim]*Non_Physical;
1838  Project_Grad_j += Vector_j[iDim]*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim]*Non_Physical;
1839  }
1840  if (limiter) {
1841  Solution_i[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar] + Project_Grad_i*Limiter_i[iDim];
1842  Solution_j[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar] + Project_Grad_j*Limiter_j[iDim];
1843  }
1844  else {
1845  Solution_i[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar] + Project_Grad_i;
1846  Solution_j[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar] + Project_Grad_j;
1847  }
1848  }
1849 
1850  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Solution_i, Solution_j);
1851 
1852  }
1853 
1854  /*--- Compute the residual---*/
1855 
1856  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
1857 
1858  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
1859 
1860  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
1861  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Residual_j);
1862 
1863  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
1864 
1865  if (implicit) {
1866  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
1867  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_ij);
1868  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ji);
1869  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(jPoint, jPoint, Jacobian_jj);
1870  }
1871 
1872  }
1873 
1874 }
1875 
1876 void CAdjEulerSolver::Source_Residual(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CNumerics *second_numerics,
1877  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
1878 
1879  unsigned short iVar;
1880  unsigned long iPoint;
1881  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
1882  bool rotating_frame = config->GetRotating_Frame();
1883  bool axisymmetric = config->GetAxisymmetric();
1884  // bool gravity = (config->GetGravityForce() == YES);
1885  bool time_spectral = (config->GetUnsteady_Simulation() == TIME_SPECTRAL);
1886  // bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
1887 
1888  /*--- Initialize the source residual to zero ---*/
1889  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Residual[iVar] = 0.0;
1890 
1891  if (rotating_frame) {
1892 
1893  /*--- Loop over all points ---*/
1894  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
1895 
1896  /*--- Load the adjoint variables ---*/
1897  numerics->SetAdjointVar(node[iPoint]->GetSolution(),
1898  node[iPoint]->GetSolution());
1899 
1900  /*--- Load the volume of the dual mesh cell ---*/
1901  numerics->SetVolume(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume());
