1902 
1903  /*--- Compute the adjoint rotating frame source residual ---*/
1904  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, config);
1905 
1906  /*--- Add the source residual to the total ---*/
1907  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1908 
1909  /*--- Add the implicit Jacobian contribution ---*/
1910  if (implicit) Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1911 
1912  }
1913  }
1914 
1915  if (time_spectral) {
1916 
1917  su2double Volume, Source;
1918 
1919  /*--- loop over points ---*/
1920  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
1921 
1922  /*--- Get control volume ---*/
1923  Volume = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
1924 
1925  /*--- Get stored time spectral source term ---*/
1926  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
1927  Source = node[iPoint]->GetTimeSpectral_Source(iVar);
1928  Residual[iVar] = Source*Volume;
1929  }
1930 
1931  /*--- Add Residual ---*/
1932  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1933 
1934  }
1935  }
1936 
1937  if (axisymmetric) {
1938 
1939  /*--- Zero out Jacobian structure ---*/
1940  if (implicit) {
1941  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar ++)
1942  for (unsigned short jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar ++)
1943  Jacobian_i[iVar][jVar] = 0.0;
1944  }
1945 
1946  /*--- loop over points ---*/
1947  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
1948 
1949  /*--- Set solution ---*/
1950  numerics->SetConservative(solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(), solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution());
1951 
1952  /*--- Set adjoint variables ---*/
1953  numerics->SetAdjointVar(node[iPoint]->GetSolution(), node[iPoint]->GetSolution());
1954 
1955  /*--- Set control volume ---*/
1956  numerics->SetVolume(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume());
1957 
1958  /*--- Set coordinate ---*/
1959  numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
1960 
1961  /*--- Compute Source term Residual ---*/
1962  numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual, Jacobian_i, config);
1963 
1964  /*--- Add Residual ---*/
1965  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1966 
1967  /*--- Implicit part ---*/
1968  if (implicit)
1969  Jacobian.AddBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_i);
1970 
1971  }
1972  }
1973 
1974  // if (gravity) {
1975  //
1976  // }
1977 
1978  // if (freesurface) {
1979  // for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
1980  //
1981  // su2double Volume = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
1982  // su2double **Gradient = solver_container[ADJLEVELSET_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient();
1983  // su2double coeff = solver_container[LEVELSET_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(0) / solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDensityInc();
1984  //
1985  // Residual[0] = 0.0;
1986  // for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
1987  // Residual[iDim+1] = coeff*Gradient[0][iDim]*Volume;
1988  // }
1989  //
1990  // LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
1991  //
1992  // }
1993  // }
1994 
1995 }
1996 
1997 void CAdjEulerSolver::Source_Template(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
1998  CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh) {
1999 }
2000 
2001 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetUndivided_Laplacian(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2002  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iEdge;
2003  unsigned short iVar;
2004  su2double *Diff;
2005 
2006  Diff = new su2double[nVar];
2007 
2008  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++)
2009  node[iPoint]->SetUnd_LaplZero();
2010 
2011  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
2012  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
2013  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
2014 
2015  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2016  Diff[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar) - node[jPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
2017 
2018 #ifdef STRUCTURED_GRID
2019 
2020  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2021  if (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetDomain()) node[jPoint]->AddUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2022 
2023 #else
2024 
2025  bool boundary_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPhysicalBoundary();
2026  bool boundary_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetPhysicalBoundary();
2027 
2028  /*--- Both points inside the domain, or both in the boundary ---*/
2029  if ((!boundary_i && !boundary_j) || (boundary_i && boundary_j)) {
2030  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2031  if (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetDomain()) node[jPoint]->AddUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2032  }
2033 
2034  /*--- iPoint inside the domain, jPoint on the boundary ---*/
2035  if (!boundary_i && boundary_j)
2036  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2037 
2038  /*--- jPoint inside the domain, iPoint on the boundary ---*/
2039  if (boundary_i && !boundary_j)
2040  if (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetDomain()) node[jPoint]->AddUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2041 
2042 #endif
2043 
2044  }
2045 
2046 #ifdef STRUCTURED_GRID
2047 
2048  unsigned long Point_Normal = 0, iVertex;
2049  unsigned short iMarker;
2050  su2double *Psi_mirror;
2051 
2052  Psi_mirror = new su2double[nVar];
2053 
2054  /*--- Loop over all boundaries and include an extra contribution
2055  from a halo node. Find the nearest normal, interior point
2056  for a boundary node and make a linear approximation. ---*/
2057  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2058 
2059  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != SEND_RECEIVE &&
2060  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERFACE_BOUNDARY &&
2061  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY &&
2062  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY) {
2063 
2064  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2065  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2066 
2067  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2068 
2069  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
2070 
2071  /*--- Interpolate & compute difference in the conserved variables ---*/
2072  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2073  Psi_mirror[iVar] = 2.0*node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar) - node[Point_Normal]->GetSolution(iVar);
2074  Diff[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar) - Psi_mirror[iVar];
2075  }
2076 
2077  /*--- Subtract contribution at the boundary node only ---*/
2078  node[iPoint]->SubtractUnd_Lapl(Diff);
2079  }
2080  }
2081  }
2082  }
2083 
2084  delete [] Psi_mirror;
2085 
2086 #endif
2087 
2088  delete [] Diff;
2089 
2090  /*--- MPI parallelization ---*/
2091  Set_MPI_Undivided_Laplacian(geometry, config);
2092 
2093 }
2094 
2095 void CAdjEulerSolver::SetDissipation_Switch(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2096 
2097  unsigned long iPoint;
2098  su2double SharpEdge_Distance, eps, ds, scale, Sensor, Param_Kappa_2, Param_Kappa_4;
2099 
2100  eps = config->GetLimiterCoeff()*config->GetRefElemLength();
2101  Param_Kappa_2 = config->GetKappa_2nd_AdjFlow();
2102  Param_Kappa_4 = config->GetKappa_4th_AdjFlow();
2103 
2104  if (Param_Kappa_2 != 0.0) scale = 2.0 * Param_Kappa_4 / Param_Kappa_2;
2105  else scale = 0.0;
2106 
2107  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
2108 
2109  SharpEdge_Distance = (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance() - config->GetSharpEdgesCoeff()*eps);
2110 
2111  ds = 0.0;
2112  if (SharpEdge_Distance < -eps) ds = 1.0;
2113  if (fabs(SharpEdge_Distance) <= eps) ds = 1.0 - (0.5*(1.0+(SharpEdge_Distance/eps)+(1.0/PI_NUMBER)*sin(PI_NUMBER*SharpEdge_Distance/eps)));
2114  if (SharpEdge_Distance > eps) ds = 0.0;
2115 
2116  Sensor = scale * ds;
2117 
2118  node[iPoint]->SetSensor(Sensor);
2119 
2120  }
2121 
2122  // su2double dx = 0.1;
2123  // su2double LimK = 0.03;
2124  // su2double eps2 = pow((LimK*dx),3);
2125  //
2126  // unsigned long iPoint, jPoint;
2127  // unsigned short iNeigh, nNeigh, iDim;
2128  // su2double **Gradient_i, *Coord_i, *Coord_j, diff_coord, dist_ij, r_u, r_u_ij,
2129  // du_max, du_min, u_ij, *Solution_i, *Solution_j, dp, dm;
2130  //
2131  //
2132  // for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++)
2133  //
2134  // if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2135  //
2136  // Solution_i = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2137  // Gradient_i = node[iPoint]->GetGradient();
2138  // Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2139  // nNeigh = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint();
2140  //
2141  // /*--- Find max and min value of the variable in the control volume around the mesh point ---*/
2142  // du_max = 1.0E-8; du_min = -1.0E-8;
2143  // for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < nNeigh; iNeigh++) {
2144  // jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
2145  // Solution_j = node[jPoint]->GetSolution();
2146  // du_max = max(du_max, Solution_j[0] - Solution_i[0]);
2147  // du_min = min(du_min, Solution_j[0] - Solution_i[0]);
2148  // }
2149  //
2150  // r_u = 1.0;
2151  // for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < nNeigh; iNeigh++) {
2152  //
2153  // /*--- Unconstrained reconstructed solution ---*/
2154  // jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
2155  // Solution_j = node[jPoint]->GetSolution();
2156  // Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
2157  // u_ij = Solution_i[0]; dist_ij = 0;
2158  // for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2159  // diff_coord = Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim];
2160  // u_ij += 0.5*diff_coord*Gradient_i[0][iDim];
2161  // }
2162  //
2163  // /*--- Venkatakrishnan limiter ---*/
2164  // if ((u_ij - Solution_i[0]) >= 0.0) dp = du_max;
2165  // else dp = du_min;
2166  // dm = u_ij - Solution_i[0];
2167  // r_u_ij = (dp*dp+2.0*dm*dp + eps2)/(dp*dp+2*dm*dm+dm*dp + eps2);
2168  //
2169  // /*--- Take the smallest value of the limiter ---*/
2170  // r_u = min(r_u, r_u_ij);
2171  //
2172  // }
2173  // node[iPoint]->SetSensor(1.0-r_u);
2174  // }
2175 
2176  /*--- MPI parallelization ---*/
2177  Set_MPI_Dissipation_Switch(geometry, config);
2178 
2179 }
2180 
2181 void CAdjEulerSolver::ExplicitRK_Iteration(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container,
2182  CConfig *config, unsigned short iRKStep) {
2183  su2double *Residual, *Res_TruncError, Vol, Delta, Res;
2184  unsigned short iVar;
2185  unsigned long iPoint;
2186 
2187  su2double RK_AlphaCoeff = config->Get_Alpha_RKStep(iRKStep);
2188 
2189  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2190  SetRes_RMS(iVar, 0.0);
2191  SetRes_Max(iVar, 0.0, 0);
2192  }
2193 
2194  /*--- Update the solution ---*/
2195  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
2196  Vol = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
2197  Delta = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time() / Vol;
2198 
2199  Res_TruncError = node[iPoint]->GetResTruncError();
2200  Residual = LinSysRes.GetBlock(iPoint);
2201 
2202  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2203  Res = Residual[iVar] + Res_TruncError[iVar];
2204  node[iPoint]->AddSolution(iVar, -Res*Delta*RK_AlphaCoeff);
2205  AddRes_RMS(iVar, Res*Res);
2206  AddRes_Max(iVar, fabs(Res), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
2207  }
2208 
2209  }
2210 
2211  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
2212  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
2213 
2214  /*--- Compute the root mean square residual ---*/
2215  SetResidual_RMS(geometry, config);
2216 
2217 }
2218 
2219 void CAdjEulerSolver::ExplicitEuler_Iteration(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
2220  su2double *local_Residual, *local_Res_TruncError, Vol, Delta, Res;
2221  unsigned short iVar;
2222  unsigned long iPoint;
2223 
2224  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2225  SetRes_RMS(iVar, 0.0);
2226  SetRes_Max(iVar, 0.0, 0);
2227  }
2228 
2229  /*--- Update the solution ---*/
2230  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
2231  Vol = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
2232  Delta = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time() / Vol;
2233 
2234  local_Res_TruncError = node[iPoint]->GetResTruncError();
2235  local_Residual = LinSysRes.GetBlock(iPoint);
2236 
2237  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2238  Res = local_Residual[iVar] + local_Res_TruncError[iVar];
2239  node[iPoint]->AddSolution(iVar, -Res*Delta);
2240  AddRes_RMS(iVar, Res*Res);
2241  AddRes_Max(iVar, fabs(Res), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
2242  }
2243 
2244  }
2245 
2246  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
2247  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
2248 
2249  /*--- Compute the root mean square residual ---*/
2250  SetResidual_RMS(geometry, config);
2251 
2252 }
2253 
2254 void CAdjEulerSolver::ImplicitEuler_Iteration(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CConfig *config) {
2255 
2256  unsigned short iVar;
2257  unsigned long iPoint, total_index;
2258  su2double Delta, *local_Res_TruncError, Vol;
2259 
2260  /*--- Set maximum residual to zero ---*/
2261 
2262  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2263  SetRes_RMS(iVar, 0.0);
2264  SetRes_Max(iVar, 0.0, 0);
2265  }
2266 
2267  /*--- Build implicit system ---*/
2268 
2269  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
2270 
2271  /*--- Read the residual ---*/
2272 
2273  local_Res_TruncError = node[iPoint]->GetResTruncError();
2274 
2275  /*--- Read the volume ---*/
2276 
2277  Vol = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
2278 
2279  /*--- Modify matrix diagonal to assure diagonal dominance ---*/
2280 
2281  if (solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time() != 0.0) {
2282  Delta = Vol / solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDelta_Time();
2283  Jacobian.AddVal2Diag(iPoint, Delta);
2284  }
2285  else {
2286  Jacobian.SetVal2Diag(iPoint, 1.0);
2287  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2288  total_index = iPoint*nVar + iVar;
2289  LinSysRes[total_index] = 0.0;
2290  local_Res_TruncError[iVar] = 0.0;
2291  }
2292  }
2293 
2294  /*--- Right hand side of the system (-Residual) and initial guess (x = 0) ---*/
2295 
2296  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2297  total_index = iPoint*nVar+iVar;
2298  LinSysRes[total_index] = -(LinSysRes[total_index] + local_Res_TruncError[iVar]);
2299  LinSysSol[total_index] = 0.0;
2300  AddRes_RMS(iVar, LinSysRes[total_index]*LinSysRes[total_index]);
2301  AddRes_Max(iVar, fabs(LinSysRes[total_index]), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGlobalIndex(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord());
2302  }
2303 
2304  }
2305 
2306  /*--- Initialize residual and solution at the ghost points ---*/
2307 
2308  for (iPoint = nPointDomain; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
2309  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2310  total_index = iPoint*nVar + iVar;
2311  LinSysRes[total_index] = 0.0;
2312  LinSysSol[total_index] = 0.0;
2313  }
2314  }
2315 
2316  /*--- Solve or smooth the linear system ---*/
2317 
2318  CSysSolve system;
2319  system.Solve(Jacobian, LinSysRes, LinSysSol, geometry, config);
2320 
2321  /*--- Update solution (system written in terms of increments) ---*/
2322 
2323  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++)
2324  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2325  node[iPoint]->AddSolution(iVar, config->GetRelaxation_Factor_AdjFlow()*LinSysSol[iPoint*nVar+iVar]);
2326  }
2327 
2328  /*--- MPI solution ---*/
2329 
2330  Set_MPI_Solution(geometry, config);
2331 
2332  /*--- Compute the root mean square residual ---*/
2333 
2334  SetResidual_RMS(geometry, config);
2335 
2336 }
2337 
2338 void CAdjEulerSolver::Inviscid_Sensitivity(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config) {
2339 
2340  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Neigh;
2341  unsigned short iPos, jPos;
2342  unsigned short iDim, iMarker, iNeigh;
2343  su2double *d = NULL, *Normal = NULL, *Psi = NULL, *U = NULL, Enthalpy, conspsi = 0.0, Mach_Inf,
2344  Area, **PrimVar_Grad = NULL, **ConsVar_Grad = NULL, *ConsPsi_Grad = NULL,
2345  ConsPsi, d_press, grad_v, Beta2, v_gradconspsi, UnitNormal[3], *GridVel = NULL,
2346  LevelSet, Target_LevelSet, eps, r, ru, rv, rw, rE, p, T, dp_dr, dp_dru, dp_drv,
2347  dp_drw, dp_drE, dH_dr, dH_dru, dH_drv, dH_drw, dH_drE, H, *USens, D[3][3], Dd[3], scale = 1.0;
2348  su2double RefVel2, RefDensity, Mach2Vel, *Velocity_Inf, factor;
2349  su2double Vn, SoundSpeed, *Velocity;
2350 
2351  USens = new su2double[nVar];
2352  Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
2353 
2354  su2double Gas_Constant = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
2355  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
2356  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
2357  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
2358  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
2359  su2double RefAreaCoeff = config->GetRefAreaCoeff();
2360  su2double Mach_Motion = config->GetMach_Motion();
2361  unsigned short ObjFunc = config->GetKind_ObjFunc();
2362 
2363  if (config->GetSystemMeasurements() == US) scale = 1.0/12.0;
2364  else scale = 1.0;
2365 
2366  /*--- Compute non-dimensional factor. For dynamic meshes, use the motion Mach
2367  number as a reference value for computing the force coefficients.
2368  Otherwise, use the freestream values,
2369  which is the standard convention. ---*/
2370 
2371  if (grid_movement) {
2372  Mach2Vel = sqrt(Gamma*Gas_Constant*config->GetTemperature_FreeStreamND());
2373  RefVel2 = (Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel)*(Mach_Motion*Mach2Vel);
2374  }
2375  else {
2376  Velocity_Inf = config->GetVelocity_FreeStreamND();
2377  RefVel2 = 0.0;
2378  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2379  RefVel2 += Velocity_Inf[iDim]*Velocity_Inf[iDim];
2380  }
2381 
2382  RefDensity = config->GetDensity_FreeStreamND();
2383 
2384  factor = 1.0/(0.5*RefDensity*RefAreaCoeff*RefVel2);
2385 
2386  if ((ObjFunc == INVERSE_DESIGN_HEATFLUX) || (ObjFunc == FREE_SURFACE) ||
2387  (ObjFunc == TOTAL_HEATFLUX) || (ObjFunc == MAXIMUM_HEATFLUX) ||
2388  (ObjFunc == MASS_FLOW_RATE) ) factor = 1.0;
2389 
2390  if ((ObjFunc == AVG_TOTAL_PRESSURE) || (ObjFunc == AVG_OUTLET_PRESSURE) ||
2391  (ObjFunc == OUTFLOW_GENERALIZED)) factor = 1.0/Area_Monitored;
2392 
2393  /*--- Initialize sensitivities to zero ---*/
2394 
2395  Total_Sens_Geo = 0.0;
2396  Total_Sens_Mach = 0.0;
2397  Total_Sens_AoA = 0.0;
2398  Total_Sens_Press = 0.0;
2399  Total_Sens_Temp = 0.0;
2400  Total_Sens_BPress = 0.0;
2401 
2402  /*--- Loop over boundary markers to select those for Euler walls ---*/
2403 
2404  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++)
2405 
2406  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL)
2407 
2408  /*--- Loop over points on the surface to store the auxiliary variable ---*/
2409 
2410  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2411  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2412  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2413  Psi = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2414  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2415  if (compressible) {
2416  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
2417  conspsi = U[0]*Psi[0] + U[0]*Enthalpy*Psi[nDim+1];
2418  }
2419  if (incompressible || freesurface) {
2420  Beta2 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetBetaInc2();
2421  conspsi = Beta2*Psi[0];
2422  }
2423  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) conspsi += U[iDim+1]*Psi[iDim+1];
2424 
2425  node[iPoint]->SetAuxVar(conspsi);
2426 
2427  /*--- Also load the auxiliary variable for first neighbors ---*/
2428 
2429  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh++) {
2430  Neigh = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
2431  Psi = node[Neigh]->GetSolution();
2432  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[Neigh]->GetSolution();
2433  if (compressible) {
2434  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[Neigh]->GetEnthalpy();
2435  conspsi = U[0]*Psi[0] + U[0]*Enthalpy*Psi[nDim+1];
2436  }
2437  if (incompressible || freesurface) {
2438  Beta2 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[Neigh]->GetBetaInc2();
2439  conspsi = Beta2*Psi[0];
2440  }
2441  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) conspsi += U[iDim+1]*Psi[iDim+1];
2442  node[Neigh]->SetAuxVar(conspsi);
2443  }
2444  }
2445  }
2446 
2447  /*--- Compute surface gradients of the auxiliary variable ---*/
2448 
2449  SetAuxVar_Surface_Gradient(geometry, config);
2450 
2451  /*--- Evaluate the shape sensitivity ---*/
2452 
2453  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2454  Sens_Geo[iMarker] = 0.0;
2455 
2456  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) {
2457  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2458  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2459  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2460 
2461  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
2462  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2463  Area = 0;
2464  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2465  Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2466  Area = sqrt(Area);
2467 
2468  PrimVar_Grad = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive();
2469  ConsVar_Grad = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient();
2470  ConsPsi_Grad = node[iPoint]->GetAuxVarGradient();
2471  ConsPsi = node[iPoint]->GetAuxVar();
2472 
2473  d_press = 0.0; grad_v = 0.0; v_gradconspsi = 0.0;
2474  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2475 
2476  /*-- Retrieve the value of the pressure gradient ---*/
2477 
2478  if (compressible) d_press += d[iDim]*PrimVar_Grad[nDim+1][iDim];
2479  if (incompressible || freesurface) d_press += d[iDim]*ConsVar_Grad[0][iDim];
2480 
2481  /*-- Retrieve the value of the velocity gradient ---*/
2482 
2483  grad_v += PrimVar_Grad[iDim+1][iDim]*ConsPsi;
2484 
2485  /*-- Retrieve the value of the theta gradient ---*/
2486 
2487  v_gradconspsi += solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity(iDim) * ConsPsi_Grad[iDim];
2488 
2489  /*--- Additional sensitivity term for grid movement ---*/
2490 
2491  if (grid_movement) {
2492  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
2493  v_gradconspsi -= GridVel[iDim] * ConsPsi_Grad[iDim];
2494  }
2495 
2496  }
2497 
2498  /*--- Compute additional term in the surface sensitivity for free surface problem. ---*/
2499 
2500  if (freesurface) {
2501  LevelSet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(nDim+1);
2502  Target_LevelSet = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(nDim-1);
2503  d_press += 0.5*(Target_LevelSet - LevelSet)*(Target_LevelSet - LevelSet);
2504  }
2505 
2506  /*--- Compute sensitivity for each surface point ---*/
2507 
2508  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = (d_press + grad_v + v_gradconspsi) * Area * scale * factor;
2509 
2510  /*--- If sharp edge, set the sensitivity to 0 on that region ---*/
2511 
2512  if (config->GetSens_Remove_Sharp()) {
2513  eps = config->GetLimiterCoeff()*config->GetRefElemLength();
2514  if ( geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance() < config->GetSharpEdgesCoeff()*eps )
2515  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = 0.0;
2516  }
2517 
2518  Sens_Geo[iMarker] -= CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
2519 
2520  }
2521  }
2522 
2523  Total_Sens_Geo += Sens_Geo[iMarker];
2524 
2525  }
2526  }
2527 
2528 
2529  /*--- Farfield Sensitivity (Mach, AoA, Press, Temp), only for compressible flows ---*/
2530 
2531  if (compressible) {
2532 
2533  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2534  Sens_BPress[iMarker] = 0.0;
2535  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == OUTLET_FLOW){
2536 
2537  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2538  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2539 
2540  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2541  Psi = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2542  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2543  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2544 
2545  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
2546  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
2547 
2548  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2549  Area = sqrt(Area);
2550 
2551  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
2552 
2553  Vn = 0.0;
2554  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2555  Velocity[iDim] = U[iDim+1]/U[0];
2556  Vn += UnitNormal[iDim]*Velocity[iDim];
2557  }
2558 
2559  SoundSpeed = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSoundSpeed();
2560  if (Vn<SoundSpeed){
2561  /* Characteristic-based
2562  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=Psi[nDim+1]*(SoundSpeed-Vn)/Gamma_Minus_One;
2563  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==AVG_OUTLET_PRESSURE)
2564  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=Vn/(SoundSpeed+Vn);
2565  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==AVG_TOTAL_PRESSURE){
2566  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++) Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim]/(2.0*Vn*(SoundSpeed+Vn));
2567  }
2568  */
2569  /*Pressure based*/
2570  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=Psi[nDim+1]*(SoundSpeed*SoundSpeed-Vn*Vn)/(Vn*Gamma_Minus_One);
2571  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==AVG_OUTLET_PRESSURE)
2572  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=1;
2573  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc()==AVG_TOTAL_PRESSURE){
2574  for (iDim=0; iDim<nDim; iDim++)
2575  Sens_BPress[iMarker]+=0.5*Velocity[iDim]*Velocity[iDim]/(Vn*Vn);
2576  }
2577  }
2578  }
2579  Total_Sens_BPress+= Sens_BPress[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2580  }
2581  }
2582 
2583  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == FAR_FIELD || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INLET_FLOW
2584  || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SUPERSONIC_INLET || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SUPERSONIC_OUTLET
2585  || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ENGINE_INFLOW ) {
2586 
2587  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
2588  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
2589  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
2590  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
2591 
2592  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2593  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2594 
2595  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2596  Psi = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2597  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
2598  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2599 
2600  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
2601  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
2602 
2603  r = U[0]; ru = U[1]; rv = U[2];
2604  if (nDim == 2) { rw = 0.0; rE = U[3]; }
2605  else { rw = U[3]; rE = U[4]; }
2606  p = Gamma_Minus_One*(rE-(ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(2*r));
2607 
2608  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2609  Area = sqrt(Area);
2610  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
2611 
2612  H = (rE + p)/r;
2613 
2614  dp_dr = Gamma_Minus_One*(ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(2*r*r);
2615  dp_dru = -Gamma_Minus_One*ru/r;
2616  dp_drv = -Gamma_Minus_One*rv/r;
2617  if (nDim == 2) { dp_drw = 0.0; dp_drE = Gamma_Minus_One; }
2618  else { dp_drw = -Gamma_Minus_One*rw/r; dp_drE = Gamma_Minus_One; }
2619 
2620  dH_dr = (-H + dp_dr)/r; dH_dru = dp_dru/r; dH_drv = dp_drv/r;
2621  if (nDim == 2) { dH_drw = 0.0; dH_drE = (1 + dp_drE)/r; }
2622  else { dH_drw = dp_drw/r; dH_drE = (1 + dp_drE)/r; }
2623 
2624  if (nDim == 2) {
2625  Jacobian_j[0][0] = 0.0;
2626  Jacobian_j[1][0] = Area*UnitNormal[0];
2627  Jacobian_j[2][0] = Area*UnitNormal[1];
2628  Jacobian_j[3][0] = 0.0;
2629 
2630  Jacobian_j[0][1] = (-(ru*ru)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2631  Jacobian_j[1][1] = (2*ru/r + dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2632  Jacobian_j[2][1] = (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2633  Jacobian_j[3][1] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0];
2634 
2635  Jacobian_j[0][2] = (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rv)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2636  Jacobian_j[1][2] = (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2637  Jacobian_j[2][2] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (2*rv/r + dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2638  Jacobian_j[3][2] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2639 
2640  Jacobian_j[0][3] = (ru*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2641  Jacobian_j[1][3] = (H + ru*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2642  Jacobian_j[2][3] = (ru*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (H + rv*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2643  Jacobian_j[3][3] = (ru*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2644  }
2645  else {
2646  Jacobian_j[0][0] = 0.0;
2647  Jacobian_j[1][0] = Area*UnitNormal[0];
2648  Jacobian_j[2][0] = Area*UnitNormal[1];
2649  Jacobian_j[3][0] = Area*UnitNormal[2];
2650  Jacobian_j[4][0] = 0.0;
2651 
2652  Jacobian_j[0][1] = (-(ru*ru)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(ru*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2653  Jacobian_j[1][1] = (2*ru/r + dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2654  Jacobian_j[2][1] = (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2655  Jacobian_j[3][1] = (dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2656  Jacobian_j[4][1] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0];
2657 
2658  Jacobian_j[0][2] = (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rv)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(rv*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2659  Jacobian_j[1][2] = (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2660  Jacobian_j[2][2] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (2*rv/r + dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2661  Jacobian_j[3][2] = (dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2662  Jacobian_j[4][2] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
2663 
2664  Jacobian_j[0][3] = (-(ru*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(rw*rw)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2665  Jacobian_j[1][3] = (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2666  Jacobian_j[2][3] = (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2667  Jacobian_j[3][3] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (2*rw/r + dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2668  Jacobian_j[4][3] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2669 
2670  Jacobian_j[0][4] = (ru*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2671  Jacobian_j[1][4] = (H + ru*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2672  Jacobian_j[2][4] = (ru*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (H + rv*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2673  Jacobian_j[3][4] = (ru*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (H + rw*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2674  Jacobian_j[4][4] = (ru*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
2675  }
2676 
2677  /*--- Mach number sensitivity ---*/
2678 
2679  USens[0] = 0.0; USens[1] = ru/Mach_Inf; USens[2] = rv/Mach_Inf;
2680  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = Gamma*Mach_Inf*p; }
2681  else { USens[3] = rw/Mach_Inf; USens[4] = Gamma*Mach_Inf*p; }
2682  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
2683  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
2684  Sens_Mach[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
2685  }
2686  }
2687 
2688  /*--- AoA sensitivity ---*/
2689 
2690  USens[0] = 0.0;
2691  if (nDim == 2) { USens[1] = -rv; USens[2] = ru; USens[3] = 0.0; }
2692  else { USens[1] = -rw; USens[2] = 0.0; USens[3] = ru; USens[4] = 0.0; }
2693  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
2694  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
2695  Sens_AoA[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
2696  }
2697  }
2698 
2699  /*--- Pressure sensitivity ---*/
2700 
2701  USens[0] = r/p; USens[1] = ru/p; USens[2] = rv/p;
2702  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = rE/p; }
2703  else { USens[3] = rw/p; USens[4] = rE/p; }
2704  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
2705  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
2706  Sens_Press[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
2707  }
2708  }
2709 
2710  /*--- Temperature sensitivity ---*/
2711 
2712  T = p/(r*Gas_Constant);
2713  USens[0] = -r/T; USens[1] = 0.5*ru/T; USens[2] = 0.5*rv/T;
2714  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = (ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(r*T); }
2715  else { USens[3] = 0.5*rw/T; USens[4] = (ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(r*T); }
2716  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
2717  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
2718  Sens_Temp[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
2719  }
2720  }
2721  }
2722  }
2723 
2724  Total_Sens_Mach -= Sens_Mach[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2725  Total_Sens_AoA -= Sens_AoA[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2726  Total_Sens_Press -= Sens_Press[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2727  Total_Sens_Temp -= Sens_Temp[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2728 
2729  }
2730  }
2731 
2732  /*--- Explicit contribution from objective function quantity ---*/
2733 
2734  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2735 
2736  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) {
2737 
2738  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
2739  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
2740  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
2741  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
2742 
2743  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2744  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2745 
2746  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
2747 
2748  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2749  p = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure();
2750 
2751  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
2752  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
2753 
2754  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
2755  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2756  Area = sqrt(Area);
2757  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
2758 
2759  /*--- Mach number sensitivity ---*/
2760 
2761  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = -(2.0/Mach_Inf)*d[iPos];
2762  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Sens_Mach[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
2763 
2764  /*--- AoA sensitivity ---*/
2765 
2766  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == DRAG_COEFFICIENT ||
2767  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == LIFT_COEFFICIENT ||
2768  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == SIDEFORCE_COEFFICIENT ||
2769  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA ||
2770  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == NEARFIELD_PRESSURE) {
2771  if (nDim == 2) {
2772  D[0][0] = 0.0; D[0][1] = -1.0;
2773  D[1][0] = 1.0; D[1][1] = 0.0;
2774  }
2775  else {
2776  D[0][0] = 0.0; D[0][1] = 0.0; D[0][2] = -1.0;
2777  D[1][0] = 0.0; D[1][1] = 0.0; D[1][2] = 0.0;
2778  D[2][0] = 1.0; D[2][1] = 0.0; D[2][2] = 0.0;
2779  }
2780  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
2781  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) {
2782  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nDim; jPos++)
2783  Dd[iPos] += D[iPos][jPos]*d[jPos];
2784  }
2785  }
2786 
2787  /*--- Coefficients with no explicit AoA dependece ---*/
2788 
2789  else {
2790  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
2791  }
2792 
2793  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++)
2794  Sens_AoA[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
2795 
2796  /*--- Pressure sensitivity ---*/
2797 
2798  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = -(1/p)*d[iPos];
2799  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++)
2800  Sens_Press[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
2801 
2802  /*--- Temperature sensitivity ---*/
2803 
2804  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
2805  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++)
2806  Sens_Temp[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
2807 
2808  }
2809  }
2810 
2811  Total_Sens_Mach += Sens_Mach[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2812  Total_Sens_AoA += Sens_AoA[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2813  Total_Sens_Press += Sens_Press[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2814  Total_Sens_Temp += Sens_Temp[iMarker] * scale * factor;
2815 
2816  }
2817  }
2818  }
2819 
2820 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
2821 
2822  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Geo = Total_Sens_Geo; Total_Sens_Geo = 0.0;
2823  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Mach = Total_Sens_Mach; Total_Sens_Mach = 0.0;
2824  su2double MyTotal_Sens_AoA = Total_Sens_AoA; Total_Sens_AoA = 0.0;
2825  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Press = Total_Sens_Press; Total_Sens_Press = 0.0;
2826  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Temp = Total_Sens_Temp; Total_Sens_Temp = 0.0;
2827  su2double MyTotal_Sens_BPress = Total_Sens_BPress; Total_Sens_BPress = 0.0;
2828 
2829  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Geo, &Total_Sens_Geo, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2830  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Mach, &Total_Sens_Mach, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2831  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_AoA, &Total_Sens_AoA, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2832  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Press, &Total_Sens_Press, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2833  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Temp, &Total_Sens_Temp, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2834  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_BPress, &Total_Sens_BPress, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2835 
2836 #endif
2837 
2838  delete [] USens;
2839  delete [] Velocity;
2840 
2841 }
2842 
2843 void CAdjEulerSolver::Smooth_Sensitivity(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config) {
2844  unsigned short iMarker;
2845  unsigned long iVertex, jVertex, nVertex, iPoint;
2846  su2double **A, *b, Sens, *ArchLength, *Coord_begin, *Coord_end, dist;
2847 
2848  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
2849  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == EULER_WALL) {
2850  nVertex = geometry->nVertex[iMarker];
2851 
2852  /*--- Allocate the linear system ---*/
2853 
2854  A = new su2double* [nVertex];
2855  b = new su2double [nVertex];
2856  ArchLength = new su2double [nVertex];
2857  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2858  A[iVertex] = new su2double [nVertex];
2859  }
2860 
2861  /*--- Initialization ---*/
2862 
2863  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2864  b[iVertex] = 0.0; ArchLength[iVertex] = 0.0;
2865  for (jVertex = 0; jVertex < nVertex; jVertex++)
2866  A[iVertex][jVertex] = 0.0;
2867  }
2868 
2869  /*--- Set the arch length ---*/
2870 
2871  ArchLength[0] = 0.0;
2872  for (iVertex = 1; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2873  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex-1]->GetNode();
2874  Coord_begin = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2875  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2876  Coord_end = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2877  dist = sqrt (pow( Coord_end[0]-Coord_begin[0], 2.0) + pow( Coord_end[1]-Coord_begin[1], 2.0));
2878  ArchLength[iVertex] = ArchLength[iVertex-1] + dist;
2879  }
2880 
2881  /*--- Remove the trailing edge effect ---*/
2882 
2883  su2double MinPosSens = 0.0; su2double MinNegSens = 0.0;
2884  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2885  Sens = CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
2886  if (ArchLength[iVertex] > ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.01) { MinNegSens = Sens; break; }
2887  }
2888 
2889  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2890  Sens = CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
2891  if (ArchLength[iVertex] > ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.99) { MinPosSens = Sens; break; }
2892  }
2893 
2894  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2895  if (ArchLength[iVertex] < ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.01)
2896  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = MinNegSens;
2897  if (ArchLength[iVertex] > ArchLength[nVertex-1]*0.99)
2898  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = MinPosSens;
2899  }
2900 
2901  /*--- Set the right hand side of the system ---*/
2902 
2903  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2904  b[iVertex] = CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
2905  }
2906 
2907  /*--- Set the mass matrix ---*/
2908 
2909  su2double Coeff = 0.0, BackDiff = 0.0, ForwDiff = 0.0, CentDiff = 0.0;
2910  su2double epsilon = 5E-5;
2911  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++) {
2912 
2913  if ((iVertex != nVertex-1) && (iVertex != 0)) {
2914  BackDiff = (ArchLength[iVertex]-ArchLength[iVertex-1]);
2915  ForwDiff = (ArchLength[iVertex+1]-ArchLength[iVertex]);
2916  CentDiff = (ArchLength[iVertex+1]-ArchLength[iVertex-1]);
2917  }
2918  if (iVertex == nVertex-1) {
2919  BackDiff = (ArchLength[nVertex-1]-ArchLength[nVertex-2]);
2920  ForwDiff = (ArchLength[0]-ArchLength[nVertex-1]);
2921  CentDiff = (ArchLength[0]-ArchLength[nVertex-2]);
2922  }
2923  if (iVertex == 0) {
2924  BackDiff = (ArchLength[0]-ArchLength[nVertex-1]);
2925  ForwDiff = (ArchLength[1]-ArchLength[0]);
2926  CentDiff = (ArchLength[1]-ArchLength[nVertex-1]);
2927  }
2928 
2929  Coeff = epsilon*2.0/(BackDiff*ForwDiff*CentDiff);
2930 
2931  A[iVertex][iVertex] = Coeff*CentDiff;
2932 
2933  if (iVertex != 0) A[iVertex][iVertex-1] = -Coeff*ForwDiff;
2934  else A[iVertex][nVertex-1] = -Coeff*ForwDiff;
2935 
2936  if (iVertex != nVertex-1) A[iVertex][iVertex+1] = -Coeff*BackDiff;
2937  else A[iVertex][0] = -Coeff*BackDiff;
2938 
2939  }
2940 
2941  /*--- Add the gradient value in the main diagonal ---*/
2942 
2943  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++)
2944  A[iVertex][iVertex] += 1.0;
2945 
2946  /*--- Dirichlet boundary condition ---*/
2947 
2948  unsigned long iVertex = SU2_TYPE::Int(nVertex/2);
2949  A[iVertex][iVertex] = 1.0;
2950  A[iVertex][iVertex+1] = 0.0;
2951  A[iVertex][iVertex-1] = 0.0;
2952 
2953  Gauss_Elimination(A, b, (unsigned short)nVertex);
2954 
2955  /*--- Set the new value of the sensitiviy ---*/
2956 
2957  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++)
2958  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = b[iVertex];
2959 
2960  /*--- Deallocate the linear system ---*/
2961 
2962  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < nVertex; iVertex++)
2963  delete [] A[iVertex];
2964  delete [] A;
2965  delete [] b;
2966  delete [] ArchLength;
2967 
2968  }
2969  }
2970 
2971 
2972 }
2973 
2974 void CAdjEulerSolver::GetEngine_Properties(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMesh, bool Output) {
2975  unsigned short iDim, iMarker, iVar;
2976  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
2977  su2double Area, Flow_Dir[3], alpha;
2978 
2979  unsigned short nMarker_EngineInflow = config->GetnMarker_EngineInflow();
2980  unsigned short nMarker_EngineBleed = config->GetnMarker_EngineBleed();
2981  unsigned short nMarker_EngineExhaust = config->GetnMarker_EngineExhaust();
2982 
2983  if ((nMarker_EngineInflow != 0) || (nMarker_EngineBleed != 0) || (nMarker_EngineExhaust != 0)) {
2984 
2985  /*--- Check the flow orientation in the nacelle inflow ---*/
2986 
2987  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
2988 
2989  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ENGINE_EXHAUST) || (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ENGINE_BLEED)) {
2990 
2991  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
2992 
2993  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
2994 
2995  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2996 
2997  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
2998 
2999  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Vector);
3000 
3001  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Vector[iDim] = -Vector[iDim];
3002 
3003  Area = 0.0;
3004  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3005  Area += Vector[iDim]*Vector[iDim];
3006  Area = sqrt (Area);
3007 
3008  /*--- Compute unitary vector ---*/
3009 
3010  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3011  Vector[iDim] /= Area;
3012 
3013  /*--- The flow direction is defined by the local velocity on the surface ---*/
3014 
3015  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3016  Flow_Dir[iDim] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iDim+1) / node[iPoint]->GetSolution(0);
3017 
3018  /*--- Dot product of normal and flow direction. ---*/
3019 
3020  alpha = 0.0;
3021  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3022  alpha += Vector[iDim]*Flow_Dir[iDim];
3023 
3024  /*--- Flow in the wrong direction. ---*/
3025 
3026  if (alpha < 0.0) {
3027 
3028  /*--- Copy the old solution ---*/
3029 
3030  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3031  node[iPoint]->SetSolution(iVar, node[iPoint]->GetSolution_Old(iVar));
3032 
3033  }
3034 
3035  }
3036  }
3037 
3038  }
3039 
3040  }
3041 
3042 }
3043 
3044 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Euler_Wall(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
3045  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
3046  su2double *d = NULL, *Normal, *U, *Psi_Aux, ProjVel = 0.0, bcn, vn = 0.0, Area, *UnitNormal;
3047  su2double *Velocity, *Psi, Enthalpy = 0.0, sq_vel, phin, phis1, phis2, DensityInc = 0.0, BetaInc2 = 0.0;
3048  unsigned short iDim, iVar, jDim;
3049 
3050  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
3051  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
3052  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
3053  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
3054  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
3055 
3056  UnitNormal = new su2double[nDim];
3057  Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
3058  Psi = new su2double[nVar];
3059 
3060  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3061  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3062 
3063  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3064  Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3065 
3066  /*--- Create a copy of the adjoint solution ---*/
3067  Psi_Aux = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3068  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Psi[iVar] = Psi_Aux[iVar];
3069 
3070  /*--- Flow solution ---*/
3071  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
3072 
3073  /*--- Read the value of the objective function ---*/
3074  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
3075 
3076  /*--- Normal vector computation ---*/
3077  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3078  Area = sqrt(Area);
3079  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
3080 
3081 
3082  /*--- Compressible solver ---*/
3083  if (compressible) {
3084 
3085  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3086  Velocity[iDim] = U[iDim+1] / U[0];
3087 
3088  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
3089  sq_vel = 0.5*solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity2();
3090 
3091  /*--- Compute projections ---*/
3092  ProjVel = 0.0; bcn = 0.0; vn = 0.0, phin = 0.0;
3093  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3094  ProjVel -= Velocity[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3095  bcn += d[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3096  vn += Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3097  phin += Psi[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3098  }
3099 
3100  /*--- Extra boundary term for grid movement ---*/
3101  if (grid_movement) {
3102  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
3103  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3104  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3105  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3106  phin -= Psi[nVar-1]*ProjGridVel;
3107  }
3108 
3109  /*--- Introduce the boundary condition ---*/
3110  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3111  Psi[iDim+1] -= ( phin - bcn ) * UnitNormal[iDim];
3112 
3113  /*--- Inner products after introducing BC (Psi has changed) ---*/
3114  phis1 = 0.0; phis2 = Psi[0] + Enthalpy * Psi[nVar-1];
3115  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3116  phis1 -= Normal[iDim]*Psi[iDim+1];
3117  phis2 += Velocity[iDim]*Psi[iDim+1];
3118  }
3119 
3120  /*--- Flux of the Euler wall ---*/
3121  Residual[0] = ProjVel * Psi[0] - phis2 * ProjVel + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * sq_vel;
3122  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3123  Residual[iDim+1] = ProjVel * Psi[iDim+1] - phis2 * Normal[iDim] - phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * Velocity[iDim];
3124  Residual[nVar-1] = ProjVel * Psi[nVar-1] + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One;
3125 
3126  /*--- Flux adjustment for grid movement ---*/
3127  if (grid_movement) {
3128  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
3129  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3130  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3131  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3132  Residual[0] -= ProjGridVel*Psi[0];
3133  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3134  Residual[iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi[iDim+1];
3135  Residual[nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi[nVar-1];
3136  }
3137 
3138  if (implicit) {
3139 
3140  /*--- Adjoint density ---*/
3141  Jacobian_ii[0][0] = 0.0;
3142  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3143  Jacobian_ii[0][iDim+1] = -ProjVel * (Velocity[iDim] - UnitNormal[iDim] * vn);
3144  Jacobian_ii[0][nVar-1] = -ProjVel * Enthalpy;
3145 
3146  /*--- Adjoint velocities ---*/
3147  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3148  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][0] = -Normal[iDim];
3149  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
3150  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][jDim+1] = -ProjVel*(UnitNormal[jDim]*UnitNormal[iDim] - Normal[iDim] * (Velocity[jDim] - UnitNormal[jDim] * vn));
3151  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] += ProjVel;
3152  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][nVar-1] = -Normal[iDim] * Enthalpy;
3153  }
3154 
3155  /*--- Adjoint energy ---*/
3156  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][0] = 0.0;
3157  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3158  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][iDim+1] = 0.0;
3159  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] = ProjVel;
3160 
3161  /*--- Jacobian contribution due to grid movement ---*/
3162  if (grid_movement) {
3163  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
3164  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3165  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3166  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3167  Jacobian_ii[0][0] -= ProjGridVel;
3168  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3169  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel;
3170  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel;
3171  }
3172 
3173  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
3174 
3175  }
3176 
3177  /*--- Update residual ---*/
3178  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
3179 
3180  }
3181  /*--- Incompressible solver ---*/
3182  if (incompressible || freesurface) {
3183 
3184  DensityInc = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDensityInc();
3185  BetaInc2 = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetBetaInc2();
3186 
3187  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3188  Velocity[iDim] = U[iDim+1] / solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDensityInc();
3189 
3190  /*--- Compute projections ---*/
3191  bcn = 0.0; phin = 0.0;
3192  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3193  bcn += d[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3194  phin += Psi[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3195  }
3196 
3197  /*--- Introduce the boundary condition ---*/
3198  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3199  Psi[iDim+1] -= ( phin - bcn ) * UnitNormal[iDim];
3200 
3201  /*--- Inner products after introducing BC (Psi has changed) ---*/
3202  phis1 = 0.0; phis2 = Psi[0] * (BetaInc2 / DensityInc);
3203  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3204  phis1 -= Normal[iDim]*Psi[iDim+1];
3205  phis2 += Velocity[iDim]*Psi[iDim+1];
3206  }
3207 
3208  /*--- Flux of the Euler wall ---*/
3209  Residual[0] = phis1;
3210  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3211  Residual[iDim+1] = - phis2 * Normal[iDim];
3212 
3213  /*--- Update residual ---*/
3214  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual);
3215 
3216  if (implicit) {
3217 
3218  /*--- Adjoint density ---*/
3219  Jacobian_ii[0][0] = 0.0;
3220  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3221  Jacobian_ii[0][iDim+1] = - Normal[iDim];
3222 
3223  /*--- Adjoint velocities ---*/
3224  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3225  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][0] = -Normal[iDim] * (BetaInc2 / DensityInc) ;
3226  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
3227  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][jDim+1] = - Normal[iDim] * Velocity[jDim];
3228  }
3229 
3230  /*--- Update Jacobian ---*/
3231  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
3232  }
3233 
3234  }
3235 
3236  }
3237  }
3238 
3239  delete [] Velocity;
3240  delete [] UnitNormal;
3241  delete [] Psi;
3242 
3243 }
3244 
3245 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Sym_Plane(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics,
3246  CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
3247 
3248  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
3249  su2double *Normal, ProjVel = 0.0, vn = 0.0, Area, *UnitNormal,
3250  *V_domain, *V_sym, *Psi_domain, *Psi_sym, *Velocity, Enthalpy = 0.0,
3251  sq_vel, phin, phis1, phis2, NormalAdjVel;
3252  unsigned short iDim, iVar, jDim;
3253 
3254  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
3255  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
3256  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
3257  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
3258  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
3259 
3260  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
3261  UnitNormal = new su2double[nDim];
3262  Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
3263  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar];
3264  Psi_sym = new su2double[nVar];
3265 
3266  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3267 
3268  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3269 
3270  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3271 
3272  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3273 
3274  Area = 0;
3275  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3276  Area = sqrt(Area);
3277 
3278  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3279  UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
3280 
3281  if (compressible) {
3282 
3283  /*--- Create a copy of the adjoint solution ---*/
3284 
3285  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3286 
3287  /*--- Retrieve flow variables ---*/
3288 
3289  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3290  Velocity[iDim] = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity(iDim);
3291 
3292  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
3293  sq_vel = 0.5*solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetVelocity2();
3294 
3295  /*--- Compute projections ---*/
3296 
3297  ProjVel = 0.0; vn = 0.0, phin = 0.0;
3298  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3299  ProjVel -= Velocity[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3300  vn += Velocity[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3301  phin += Psi_domain[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3302  }
3303 
3304  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
3305 
3306  if (grid_movement) {
3307  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
3308  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3309  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3310  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3311  }
3312  phin -= Psi_domain[nVar-1]*ProjGridVel;
3313  }
3314 
3315  /*--- Introduce the boundary condition ---*/
3316 
3317  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3318  Psi_domain[iDim+1] -= phin * UnitNormal[iDim];
3319 
3320  /*--- Inner products after introducing BC (Psi has changed) ---*/
3321 
3322  phis1 = 0.0; phis2 = Psi_domain[0] + Enthalpy * Psi_domain[nVar-1];
3323  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3324  phis1 -= Normal[iDim]*Psi_domain[iDim+1];
3325  phis2 += Velocity[iDim]*Psi_domain[iDim+1];
3326  }
3327 
3328  /*--- Flux of the Euler wall ---*/
3329 
3330  Residual_i[0] = ProjVel * Psi_domain[0] - phis2 * ProjVel + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * sq_vel;
3331  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3332  Residual_i[iDim+1] = ProjVel * Psi_domain[iDim+1] - phis2 * Normal[iDim] - phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * Velocity[iDim];
3333  Residual_i[nVar-1] = ProjVel * Psi_domain[nVar-1] + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One;
3334 
3335  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
3336 
3337  if (grid_movement) {
3338  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
3339  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3340  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3341  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3342  Residual_i[0] -= ProjGridVel*Psi_domain[0];
3343  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3344  Residual_i[iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi_domain[iDim+1];
3345  Residual_i[nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel*Psi_domain[nVar-1];
3346  }
3347 
3348  }
3349 
3350  if (incompressible || freesurface) {
3351 
3352  /*--- Set the normal vector ---*/
3353 
3354  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3355  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3356 
3357  /*--- Retrieve solution at boundary node ---*/
3358 
3359  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3360  V_sym = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3361 
3362  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_sym);
3363 
3364  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the wall ---*/
3365 
3366  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3367  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3368  Psi_sym[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3369  }
3370 
3371  /*--- Compute normal component of the adjoint velocity ---*/
3372 
3373  NormalAdjVel = 0.0;
3374  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3375  NormalAdjVel += Psi_domain[iDim+1]*UnitNormal[iDim];
3376 
3377  /*--- Remove the normal component ---*/
3378 
3379  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3380  Psi_sym[iDim+1] -= NormalAdjVel*UnitNormal[iDim];
3381 
3382  /*--- Set the value of the adjoint variables ---*/
3383 
3384  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_sym);
3385 
3386  /*--- Compute the upwind flux ---*/
3387 
3388  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
3389 
3390  }
3391 
3392  /*--- Update residual ---*/
3393 
3394  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
3395 
3396  /*--- Implicit stuff ---*/
3397 
3398  if (implicit) {
3399 
3400  if (compressible) {
3401 
3402  /*--- Adjoint density ---*/
3403 
3404  Jacobian_ii[0][0] = 0.0;
3405  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3406  Jacobian_ii[0][iDim+1] = -ProjVel * (Velocity[iDim] - UnitNormal[iDim] * vn);
3407  Jacobian_ii[0][nVar-1] = -ProjVel * Enthalpy;
3408 
3409  /*--- Adjoint velocities ---*/
3410 
3411  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3412  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][0] = -Normal[iDim];
3413  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
3414  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][jDim+1] = -ProjVel*(UnitNormal[jDim]*UnitNormal[iDim] - Normal[iDim] * (Velocity[jDim] - UnitNormal[jDim] * vn));
3415  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] += ProjVel;
3416  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][nVar-1] = -Normal[iDim] * Enthalpy;
3417  }
3418 
3419  /*--- Adjoint energy ---*/
3420 
3421  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][0] = 0.0;
3422  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3423  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][iDim+1] = 0.0;
3424  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] = ProjVel;
3425 
3426  /*--- Contribution from grid movement ---*/
3427 
3428  if (grid_movement) {
3429  su2double ProjGridVel = 0.0;
3430  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3431  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3432  ProjGridVel -= GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
3433  Jacobian_ii[0][0] -= ProjGridVel;
3434  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3435  Jacobian_ii[iDim+1][iDim+1] -= ProjGridVel;
3436  Jacobian_ii[nVar-1][nVar-1] -= ProjGridVel;
3437  }
3438  }
3439 
3440  /*--- Update jacobian ---*/
3441 
3442  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
3443 
3444  }
3445 
3446  }
3447  }
3448 
3449  delete [] Velocity;
3450  delete [] Psi_domain;
3451  delete [] Psi_sym;
3452  delete [] Normal;
3453  delete [] UnitNormal;
3454 
3455 }
3456 
3457 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Interface_Boundary(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
3458  CConfig *config) {
3459 
3460  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, jPoint;
3461  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMarker;
3462  su2double *V_i, *V_j;
3463 
3464  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
3465 
3466  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
3467  su2double *Psi_i = new su2double[nVar];
3468  su2double *Psi_j = new su2double[nVar];
3469 
3470 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
3471 
3472  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3473 
3474  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INTERFACE_BOUNDARY) {
3475 
3476  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3477  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3478  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorPoint();
3479 
3480  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3481 
3482  /*--- Adjoint variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
3483 
3484  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3485  Psi_i[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3486  Psi_j[iVar] = node[jPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3487  }
3488  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
3489 
3490  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
3491 
3492  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3493  V_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3494  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_j);
3495 
3496  /*--- Set face vector, and area ---*/
3497 
3498  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3499  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3500  numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3501 
3502  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
3503 
3504  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Conv_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
3505 
3506  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
3507 
3508  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
3509  if (implicit) Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
3510 
3511  }
3512  }
3513  }
3514  }
3515 
3516 #else
3517 
3518  int rank, jProcessor;
3519  MPI_Status send_stat[1], recv_stat[1];
3520  MPI_Request send_req[1], recv_req[1];
3521  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
3522 
3523  bool compute;
3524  su2double *Buffer_Send_Psi = new su2double[nVar];
3525  su2double *Buffer_Receive_Psi = new su2double[nVar];
3526 
3527  /*--- Do the send process, by the moment we are sending each
3528  node individually, this must be changed ---*/
3529 
3530  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3531 
3532  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INTERFACE_BOUNDARY) {
3533 
3534  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3535 
3536  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3537 
3538  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3539 
3540  /*--- Find the associate pair to the original node ---*/
3541 
3542  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[0];
3543  jProcessor = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[1];
3544 
3545  if ((iPoint == jPoint) && (jProcessor == rank)) compute = false;
3546  else compute = true;
3547 
3548  /*--- We only send the information that belong to other boundary ---*/
3549 
3550  if (compute) {
3551 
3552  if (jProcessor != rank) {
3553 
3554  /*--- Copy the adjoint variable ---*/
3555 
3556  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3557  Buffer_Send_Psi[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3558 
3559  SU2_MPI::Isend(Buffer_Send_Psi, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, jProcessor, iPoint, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &send_req[0]);
3560 
3561  /*--- Wait for this set of non-blocking comm. to complete ---*/
3562 
3563  SU2_MPI::Waitall(1, send_req, send_stat);
3564 
3565  }
3566 
3567  }
3568 
3569  }
3570  }
3571 
3572 
3573  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3574 
3575  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3576 
3577  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3578 
3579  /*--- Find the associate pair to the original node ---*/
3580 
3581  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[0];
3582  jProcessor = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[1];
3583 
3584  if ((iPoint == jPoint) && (jProcessor == rank)) compute = false;
3585  else compute = true;
3586 
3587  if (compute) {
3588 
3589  /*--- We only receive the information that belong to other boundary ---*/
3590 
3591  if (jProcessor != rank) {
3592 
3593  SU2_MPI::Irecv(Buffer_Receive_Psi, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, jProcessor, jPoint, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &recv_req[0]);
3594 
3595  /*--- Wait for the this set of non-blocking recv's to complete ---*/
3596 
3597  SU2_MPI::Waitall(1, recv_req, recv_stat);
3598 
3599  } else {
3600  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3601  Buffer_Receive_Psi[iVar] = node[jPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3602  }
3603 
3604  /*--- Store the solution for both points ---*/
3605 
3606  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3607  Psi_i[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3608  Psi_j[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_Psi[iVar];
3609  }
3610 
3611  /*--- Set adjoint Variables ---*/
3612 
3613  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
3614 
3615  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction (the same at both points) ---*/
3616 
3617  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3618  V_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3619  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_j);
3620 
3621  /*--- Set Normal ---*/
3622 
3623  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3624  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3625  numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3626 
3627  /*--- Compute the convective residual using an upwind scheme ---*/
3628  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Conv_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
3629 
3630  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
3631 
3632  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
3633  if (implicit) Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
3634 
3635  }
3636 
3637  }
3638  }
3639  }
3640  }
3641 
3642  MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3643 
3644  delete[] Buffer_Send_Psi;
3645  delete[] Buffer_Receive_Psi;
3646 
3647 #endif
3648 
3649  delete[] Normal;
3650  delete[] Psi_i;
3651  delete[] Psi_j;
3652 
3653 }
3654 
3655 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_NearField_Boundary(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *numerics,
3656  CConfig *config) {
3657 
3658  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, jPoint, Pin, Pout;
3659  unsigned short iDim, iVar, iMarker;
3660  su2double *V_i, *V_j, *IntBoundary_Jump;
3661 
3662  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_Flow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
3663 
3664  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
3665  su2double *Psi_i = new su2double[nVar];
3666  su2double *Psi_j = new su2double[nVar];
3667  su2double *Psi_out = new su2double[nVar];
3668  su2double *Psi_in = new su2double[nVar];
3669  su2double *MeanPsi = new su2double[nVar];
3670  su2double *Psi_out_ghost = new su2double[nVar];
3671  su2double *Psi_in_ghost = new su2double[nVar];
3672 
3673 
3674 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
3675 
3676  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3677 
3678  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY) {
3679 
3680  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3681  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3682  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetDonorPoint();
3683 
3684  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3685 
3686  /*--- Adjoint variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
3687 
3688  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3689  Psi_i[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3690  Psi_j[iVar] = node[jPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3691  }
3692 
3693  /*--- If equivalent area or nearfield pressure condition ---*/
3694 
3695  if ((config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA) ||
3696  (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == NEARFIELD_PRESSURE)) {
3697 
3698  /*--- Identify the inner and the outer point (based on the normal direction) ---*/
3699 
3700  if (Normal[nDim-1] < 0.0) { Pin = iPoint; Pout = jPoint; }
3701  else { Pout = iPoint; Pin = jPoint; }
3702 
3703  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3704  Psi_out[iVar] = node[Pout]->GetSolution(iVar);
3705  Psi_in[iVar] = node[Pin]->GetSolution(iVar);
3706  MeanPsi[iVar] = 0.5*(Psi_out[iVar] + Psi_in[iVar]);
3707  }
3708 
3709  IntBoundary_Jump = node[iPoint]->GetIntBoundary_Jump();
3710 
3711  /*--- Inner point ---*/
3712 
3713  if (iPoint == Pin) {
3714  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3715  Psi_in_ghost[iVar] = 2.0*MeanPsi[iVar] - Psi_in[iVar] - IntBoundary_Jump[iVar];
3716  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_in, Psi_in_ghost);
3717  }
3718 
3719  /*--- Outer point ---*/
3720 
3721  if (iPoint == Pout) {
3722  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3723  Psi_out_ghost[iVar] = 2.0*MeanPsi[iVar] - Psi_out[iVar] + IntBoundary_Jump[iVar];
3724  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_out, Psi_out_ghost);
3725  }
3726 
3727  }
3728  else {
3729 
3730  /*--- Just do a periodic BC ---*/
3731 
3732  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
3733 
3734  }
3735 
3736  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction ---*/
3737 
3738  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3739  V_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3740  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_j);
3741 
3742  /*--- Set Normal ---*/
3743 
3744  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3745  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3746  numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3747 
3748 
3749  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
3750 
3751  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Conv_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
3752 
3753  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
3754 
3755  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
3756  if (implicit) Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
3757 
3758  }
3759  }
3760  }
3761  }
3762 
3763 #else
3764 
3765  int rank, jProcessor;
3766  MPI_Status status;
3767  //MPI_Status send_stat[1], recv_stat[1];
3768  //MPI_Request send_req[1], recv_req[1];
3769  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
3770 
3771  bool compute;
3772  su2double *Buffer_Send_Psi = new su2double[nVar];
3773  su2double *Buffer_Receive_Psi = new su2double[nVar];
3774 
3775  /*--- Do the send process, by the moment we are sending each
3776  node individually, this must be changed ---*/
3777 
3778  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3779 
3780  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == NEARFIELD_BOUNDARY) {
3781 
3782  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3783 
3784  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3785 
3786  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3787 
3788  /*--- Find the associate pair to the original node ---*/
3789 
3790  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[0];
3791  jProcessor = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[1];
3792 
3793  if ((iPoint == jPoint) && (jProcessor == rank)) compute = false;
3794  else compute = true;
3795 
3796  /*--- We only send the information that belong to other boundary ---*/
3797  if (compute) {
3798 
3799  if (jProcessor != rank) {
3800 
3801  /*--- Copy the adjoint variable ---*/
3802 
3803  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3804  Buffer_Send_Psi[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3805 
3806  SU2_MPI::Bsend(Buffer_Send_Psi, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, jProcessor, iPoint, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3807 
3808  // SU2_MPI::Isend(Buffer_Send_Psi, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, jProcessor, iPoint, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &send_req[0]);
3809 
3810  /*--- Wait for this set of non-blocking comm. to complete ---*/
3811 
3812  // SU2_MPI::Waitall(1, send_req, send_stat);
3813 
3814  }
3815 
3816  }
3817 
3818  }
3819  }
3820 
3821 
3822  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3823 
3824  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3825 
3826  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3827 
3828  /*--- Find the associate pair to the original node ---*/
3829 
3830  jPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[0];
3831  jProcessor = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetPeriodicPointDomain()[1];
3832 
3833  if ((iPoint == jPoint) && (jProcessor == rank)) compute = false;
3834  else compute = true;
3835 
3836  if (compute) {
3837 
3838  /*--- We only receive the information that belong to other boundary ---*/
3839 
3840  if (jProcessor != rank) {
3841 
3842  SU2_MPI::Recv(Buffer_Receive_Psi, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, jProcessor, jPoint, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
3843 
3844  // SU2_MPI::Irecv(Buffer_Receive_Psi, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, jProcessor, jPoint, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &recv_req[0]);
3845 
3846  /*--- Wait for the this set of non-blocking recv's to complete ---*/
3847 
3848  // SU2_MPI::Waitall(1, recv_req, recv_stat);
3849 
3850  }
3851  else {
3852  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3853  Buffer_Receive_Psi[iVar] = node[jPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3854  }
3855 
3856  /*--- Store the solution for both points ---*/
3857 
3858  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3859  Psi_i[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3860  Psi_j[iVar] = Buffer_Receive_Psi[iVar];
3861  }
3862 
3863  /*--- If equivalent area or nearfield pressure condition ---*/
3864 
3865  if ((config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA) ||
3866  (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == NEARFIELD_PRESSURE)) {
3867 
3868  /*--- Identify the inner and the outer point (based on the normal direction) ---*/
3869 
3870  if (Normal[nDim-1] < 0.0) { Pin = iPoint; Pout = jPoint; }
3871  else { Pout = iPoint; Pin = jPoint; }
3872 
3873  IntBoundary_Jump = node[iPoint]->GetIntBoundary_Jump();
3874 
3875  /*--- Inner point ---*/
3876 
3877  if (iPoint == Pin) {
3878  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3879  Psi_in[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar]; Psi_out[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar];
3880  MeanPsi[iVar] = 0.5*(Psi_out[iVar] + Psi_in[iVar]);
3881  Psi_in_ghost[iVar] = 2.0*MeanPsi[iVar] - Psi_in[iVar] - IntBoundary_Jump[iVar];
3882  }
3883  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_in, Psi_in_ghost);
3884  }
3885 
3886  /*--- Outer point ---*/
3887 
3888  if (iPoint == Pout) {
3889  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3890  Psi_in[iVar] = Psi_j[iVar]; Psi_out[iVar] = Psi_i[iVar];
3891  MeanPsi[iVar] = 0.5*(Psi_out[iVar] + Psi_in[iVar]);
3892  Psi_out_ghost[iVar] = 2.0*MeanPsi[iVar] - Psi_out[iVar] + IntBoundary_Jump[iVar];
3893  }
3894  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_out, Psi_out_ghost);
3895  }
3896  }
3897  else {
3898 
3899  /*--- Just do a periodic BC ---*/
3900 
3901  numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_i, Psi_j);
3902 
3903  }
3904 
3905  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction (the same at both points) ---*/
3906 
3907  V_i = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3908  V_j = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3909  numerics->SetPrimitive(V_i, V_j);
3910 
3911  /*--- Set Normal ---*/
3912 
3913  geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3914  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3915  numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3916 
3917  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
3918 
3919  numerics->ComputeResidual(Res_Conv_i, Res_Conv_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
3920 
3921  /*--- Add Residuals and Jacobians ---*/
3922 
3923  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
3924  if (implicit) Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
3925 
3926  }
3927  }
3928  }
3929  }
3930  }
3931 
3932  MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3933 
3934  delete[] Buffer_Send_Psi;
3935  delete[] Buffer_Receive_Psi;
3936 
3937 #endif
3938 
3939  delete[] Normal;
3940  delete[] Psi_i;
3941  delete[] Psi_j;
3942  delete[] Psi_out;
3943  delete[] Psi_in;
3944  delete[] MeanPsi;
3945  delete[] Psi_out_ghost;
3946  delete[] Psi_in_ghost;
3947 
3948 
3949 }
3950 
3951 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Far_Field(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
3952 
3953  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
3954  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
3955  su2double *Normal, *V_domain, *V_infty, *Psi_domain, *Psi_infty;
3956 
3957  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
3958  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
3959 
3960  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
3961  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_infty = new su2double[nVar];
3962 
3963  /*--- Loop over all the vertices ---*/
3964 
3965  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
3966  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3967 
3968  /*--- If the node belongs to the domain ---*/
3969 
3970  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3971 
3972  /*--- Index of the closest interior node ---*/
3973 
3974  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
3975 
3976  /*--- Set the normal vector ---*/
3977 
3978  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
3979  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
3980  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
3981 
3982  /*--- Allocate the value at the infinity ---*/
3983 
3984  V_infty = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
3985 
3986  /*--- Retrieve solution at the farfield boundary node ---*/
3987 
3988  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
3989 
3990  conv_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_infty);
3991 
3992  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the wall ---*/
3993 
3994  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3995  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
3996  Psi_infty[iVar] = 0.0;
3997  }
3998  conv_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_infty);
3999 
4000  /*--- Grid Movement ---*/
4001 
4002  if (grid_movement)
4003  conv_numerics->SetGridVel(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel(), geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel());
4004 
4005  /*--- Compute the upwind flux ---*/
4006 
4007  conv_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4008 
4009  /*--- Add and Subtract Residual ---*/
4010 
4011  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4012 
4013  /*--- Implicit contribution to the residual ---*/
4014 
4015  if (implicit)
4016  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4017 
4018  /*--- Viscous residual contribution, it doesn't work ---*/
4019 
4020  if (config->GetViscous()) {
4021 
4022  /*--- Points in edge, coordinates and normal vector---*/
4023 
4024  visc_numerics->SetCoord(geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(), geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord());
4025  visc_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4026 
4027  /*--- Conservative variables w/o reconstruction and adjoint variables w/o reconstruction---*/
4028 
4029  visc_numerics->SetPrimitive(V_domain, V_infty);
4030  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVar(Psi_domain, Psi_infty);
4031 
4032  /*--- Gradient and limiter of Adjoint Variables ---*/
4033 
4034  visc_numerics->SetAdjointVarGradient(node[iPoint]->GetGradient(), node[iPoint]->GetGradient());
4035 
4036  /*--- Compute residual ---*/
4037 
4038  visc_numerics->ComputeResidual(Residual_i, Residual_j, Jacobian_ii, Jacobian_ij, Jacobian_ji, Jacobian_jj, config);
4039 
4040  /*--- Update adjoint viscous residual ---*/
4041 
4042  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Residual_i);
4043 
4044  if (implicit)
4045  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
4046 
4047  }
4048 
4049  }
4050  }
4051 
4052  delete [] Normal;
4053  delete [] Psi_domain; delete [] Psi_infty;
4054 }
4055 
4056 void CAdjEulerSolver::BC_Supersonic_Inlet(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container,
4057  CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
4058  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
4059  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, Point_Normal;
4060  su2double *V_inlet, *V_domain, *Normal, *Psi_domain, *Psi_inlet;
4061 
4062  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
4063  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
4064  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(val_marker);
4065 
4066  Normal = new su2double[nDim];
4067  Psi_domain = new su2double[nVar]; Psi_inlet = new su2double[nVar];
4068 
4069  /*--- Loop over all the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
4070 
4071  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
4072  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4073 
4074  /*--- Check that the node belongs to the domain (i.e., not a halo node) ---*/
4075 
4076  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
4077 
4078  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
4079 
4080  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
4081  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
4082  conv_numerics->SetNormal(Normal);
4083 
4084  /*--- Allocate the value at the inlet ---*/
4085 
4086  V_inlet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetCharacPrimVar(val_marker, iVertex);
4087 
4088  /*--- Retrieve solution at the boundary node ---*/
4089 
4090  V_domain = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPrimitive();
4091 
4092  /*--- Adjoint flow solution at the boundary ---*/
4093 
4094  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
4095  Psi_domain[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
4096
