6067  /*--- Form psi5_tau_partial = \Psi_5 * \partial_n (v - u_x)_i * tau_{ij} * n_j ---*/
6068 
6069  psi5_tau_partial = 0.0;
6070  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6071  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
6072  psi5_tau_partial -= Psi[nDim+1]*normal_grad_v_ux[iDim]*tau[iDim][jDim]*UnitNormal[jDim];
6073 
6074  /*--- Form psi5_p_div_vel = ---*/
6075 
6076  psi5_p_div_vel = -Psi[nDim+1]*Pressure*div_vel;
6077 
6078  /*--- Form psi5_tau_grad_vel = \Psi_5 * tau_{ij} : \nabla( v ) ---*/
6079 
6080  psi5_tau_grad_vel = 0.0;
6081  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6082  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
6083  psi5_tau_grad_vel += Psi[nDim+1]*tau[iDim][jDim]*PrimVar_Grad[iDim+1][jDim];
6084 
6085  /*--- Retrieve the angular velocity vector ---*/
6086 
6087  source_v_1 = 0.0;
6088  if (rotating_frame) {
6089 
6090  Omega[0] = (config->GetRotation_Rate_X(ZONE_0)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
6091  Omega[1] = (config->GetRotation_Rate_Y(ZONE_0)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
6092  Omega[2] = (config->GetRotation_Rate_Z(ZONE_0)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
6093 
6094  /*--- Calculate momentum source terms as: rho * ( Omega X V ) ---*/
6095 
6096  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6097  rho_v[iDim] = U[iDim+1];
6098  if (nDim == 2) rho_v[2] = 0.0;
6099 
6100  CrossProduct[0] = Omega[1]*rho_v[2] - Omega[2]*rho_v[1];
6101  CrossProduct[1] = Omega[2]*rho_v[0] - Omega[0]*rho_v[2];
6102  CrossProduct[2] = Omega[0]*rho_v[1] - Omega[1]*rho_v[0];
6103 
6104 
6105  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6106  source_v_1 += Psi[iDim+1]*CrossProduct[iDim];
6107  }
6108  }
6109 
6110  /*--- For simplicity, store all additional terms within sigma_partial ---*/
6111 
6112  sigma_partial = sigma_partial + vartheta_partial + psi5_tau_partial + psi5_p_div_vel + psi5_tau_grad_vel + source_v_1;
6113 
6114  }
6115 
6116  /*--- Compute additional term in the surface sensitivity for free surface problem. ---*/
6117 
6118  if (freesurface) {
6119  LevelSet = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution(nDim+1);
6120  Target_LevelSet = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord(nDim-1);
6121  sigma_partial += 0.5*(Target_LevelSet - LevelSet)*(Target_LevelSet - LevelSet);
6122  }
6123 
6124  /*--- Compute sensitivity for each surface point ---*/
6125 
6126  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = (sigma_partial - temp_sens) * Area * scale * factor;
6127 
6128  /*--- If sharp edge, set the sensitivity to 0 on that region ---*/
6129 
6130  if (config->GetSens_Remove_Sharp()) {
6131  eps = config->GetLimiterCoeff()*config->GetRefElemLength();
6132  if ( geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance() < config->GetSharpEdgesCoeff()*eps )
6133  CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex] = 0.0;
6134  }
6135 
6136  Sens_Geo[iMarker] -= CSensitivity[iMarker][iVertex];
6137 
6138  }
6139  }
6140 
6141  Total_Sens_Geo += Sens_Geo[iMarker];
6142 
6143  }
6144  }
6145 
6146  /*--- Farfield Sensitivity (Mach, AoA, Press, Temp), only for compressible flows ---*/
6147 
6148  if (compressible) {
6149 
6150  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
6151 
6152  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == FAR_FIELD || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == INLET_FLOW ||
6153  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SUPERSONIC_INLET || config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == SUPERSONIC_OUTLET ||
6154  config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ENGINE_INFLOW ) {
6155 
6156  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
6157  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
6158  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
6159  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
6160  Sens_BPress[iMarker] = 0.0;
6161 
6162  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
6163  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
6164 
6165  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
6166  Psi = node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
6167  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
6168  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
6169 
6170  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
6171  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
6172 
6173  r = U[0]; ru = U[1]; rv = U[2];
6174  if (nDim == 2) { rw = 0.0; rE = U[3]; }
6175  else { rw = U[3]; rE = U[4]; }
6176  p = Gamma_Minus_One*(rE-(ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(2*r));
6177 
6178  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
6179  Area = sqrt(Area);
6180  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
6181 
6182  H = (rE + p)/r;
6183 
6184  dp_dr = Gamma_Minus_One*(ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(2*r*r);
6185  dp_dru = -Gamma_Minus_One*ru/r;
6186  dp_drv = -Gamma_Minus_One*rv/r;
6187  if (nDim == 2) { dp_drw = 0.0; dp_drE = Gamma_Minus_One; }
6188  else { dp_drw = -Gamma_Minus_One*rw/r; dp_drE = Gamma_Minus_One; }
6189 
6190  dH_dr = (-H + dp_dr)/r; dH_dru = dp_dru/r; dH_drv = dp_drv/r;
6191  if (nDim == 2) { dH_drw = 0.0; dH_drE = (1 + dp_drE)/r; }
6192  else { dH_drw = dp_drw/r; dH_drE = (1 + dp_drE)/r; }
6193 
6194  if (nDim == 2) {
6195  Jacobian_j[0][0] = 0.0;
6196  Jacobian_j[1][0] = Area*UnitNormal[0];
6197  Jacobian_j[2][0] = Area*UnitNormal[1];
6198  Jacobian_j[3][0] = 0.0;
6199 
6200  Jacobian_j[0][1] = (-(ru*ru)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6201  Jacobian_j[1][1] = (2*ru/r + dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6202  Jacobian_j[2][1] = (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6203  Jacobian_j[3][1] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0];
6204 
6205  Jacobian_j[0][2] = (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rv)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6206  Jacobian_j[1][2] = (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6207  Jacobian_j[2][2] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (2*rv/r + dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6208  Jacobian_j[3][2] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6209 
6210  Jacobian_j[0][3] = (ru*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6211  Jacobian_j[1][3] = (H + ru*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6212  Jacobian_j[2][3] = (ru*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (H + rv*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6213  Jacobian_j[3][3] = (ru*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6214  }
6215  else {
6216  Jacobian_j[0][0] = 0.0;
6217  Jacobian_j[1][0] = Area*UnitNormal[0];
6218  Jacobian_j[2][0] = Area*UnitNormal[1];
6219  Jacobian_j[3][0] = Area*UnitNormal[2];
6220  Jacobian_j[4][0] = 0.0;
6221 
6222  Jacobian_j[0][1] = (-(ru*ru)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(ru*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6223  Jacobian_j[1][1] = (2*ru/r + dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6224  Jacobian_j[2][1] = (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6225  Jacobian_j[3][1] = (dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6226  Jacobian_j[4][1] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0];
6227 
6228  Jacobian_j[0][2] = (-(ru*rv)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rv)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(rv*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6229  Jacobian_j[1][2] = (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6230  Jacobian_j[2][2] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (2*rv/r + dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6231  Jacobian_j[3][2] = (dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6232  Jacobian_j[4][2] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1];
6233 
6234  Jacobian_j[0][3] = (-(ru*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (-(rv*rw)/(r*r))*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (-(rw*rw)/(r*r) + dp_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6235  Jacobian_j[1][3] = (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (dp_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6236  Jacobian_j[2][3] = (rw/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (dp_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6237  Jacobian_j[3][3] = (ru/r)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv/r)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (2*rw/r + dp_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6238  Jacobian_j[4][3] = (dp_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6239 
6240  Jacobian_j[0][4] = (ru*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_dr)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6241  Jacobian_j[1][4] = (H + ru*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_dru)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6242  Jacobian_j[2][4] = (ru*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (H + rv*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_drv)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6243  Jacobian_j[3][4] = (ru*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (H + rw*dH_drw)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6244  Jacobian_j[4][4] = (ru*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[0] + (rv*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[1] + (rw*dH_drE)*Area*UnitNormal[2];
6245  }
6246 
6247  /*--- Mach number sensitivity ---*/
6248 
6249  USens[0] = 0.0; USens[1] = ru/Mach_Inf; USens[2] = rv/Mach_Inf;
6250  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = Gamma*Mach_Inf*p; }
6251  else { USens[3] = rw/Mach_Inf; USens[4] = Gamma*Mach_Inf*p; }
6252  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
6253  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
6254  Sens_Mach[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
6255  }
6256  }
6257 
6258  /*--- AoA sensitivity ---*/
6259 
6260  USens[0] = 0.0;
6261  if (nDim == 2) { USens[1] = -rv; USens[2] = ru; USens[3] = 0.0; }
6262  else { USens[1] = -rw; USens[2] = 0.0; USens[3] = ru; USens[4] = 0.0; }
6263  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
6264  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
6265  Sens_AoA[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
6266  }
6267  }
6268 
6269  /*--- Pressure sensitivity ---*/
6270 
6271  USens[0] = r/p; USens[1] = ru/p; USens[2] = rv/p;
6272  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = rE/p; }
6273  else { USens[3] = rw/p; USens[4] = rE/p; }
6274  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
6275  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
6276  Sens_Press[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
6277  }
6278  }
6279 
6280  /*--- Temperature sensitivity ---*/
6281 
6282  T = p/(r*Gas_Constant);
6283  USens[0] = -r/T; USens[1] = 0.5*ru/T; USens[2] = 0.5*rv/T;
6284  if (nDim == 2) { USens[3] = (ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(r*T); }
6285  else { USens[3] = 0.5*rw/T; USens[4] = (ru*ru + rv*rv + rw*rw)/(r*T); }
6286  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nVar; iPos++) {
6287  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nVar; jPos++) {
6288  Sens_Temp[iMarker] += Psi[iPos]*Jacobian_j[jPos][iPos]*USens[jPos];
6289  }
6290  }
6291  }
6292  }
6293 
6294  Total_Sens_Mach -= Sens_Mach[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6295  Total_Sens_AoA -= Sens_AoA[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6296  Total_Sens_Press -= Sens_Press[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6297  Total_Sens_Temp -= Sens_Temp[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6298 
6299  }
6300 
6301  }
6302 
6303  /*--- Explicit contribution from objective function quantity ---*/
6304 
6305  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < nMarker; iMarker++) {
6306 
6307  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == HEAT_FLUX) ||
6308  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == ISOTHERMAL)) {
6309 
6310  Sens_Mach[iMarker] = 0.0;
6311  Sens_AoA[iMarker] = 0.0;
6312  Sens_Press[iMarker] = 0.0;
6313  Sens_Temp[iMarker] = 0.0;
6314  Sens_BPress[iMarker] = 0.0;
6315 
6316  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
6317  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
6318 
6319  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
6320 
6321  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
6322  p = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure();
6323 
6324  Mach_Inf = config->GetMach();
6325  if (grid_movement) Mach_Inf = config->GetMach_Motion();
6326 
6327  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
6328  Area = 0.0; for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
6329  Area = sqrt(Area);
6330  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) UnitNormal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim]/Area;
6331 
6332  /*--- Mach number sensitivity ---*/
6333 
6334  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = -(2.0/Mach_Inf)*d[iPos];
6335  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Sens_Mach[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
6336 
6337  /*--- AoA sensitivity ---*/
6338 
6339  if (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == DRAG_COEFFICIENT ||
6340  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == LIFT_COEFFICIENT ||
6341  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == SIDEFORCE_COEFFICIENT ||
6342  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == EQUIVALENT_AREA ||
6343  config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == NEARFIELD_PRESSURE) {
6344  if (nDim == 2) {
6345  D[0][0] = 0.0; D[0][1] = -1.0;
6346  D[1][0] = 1.0; D[1][1] = 0.0;
6347  }
6348  else {
6349  D[0][0] = 0.0; D[0][1] = 0.0; D[0][2] = -1.0;
6350  D[1][0] = 0.0; D[1][1] = 0.0; D[1][2] = 0.0;
6351  D[2][0] = 1.0; D[2][1] = 0.0; D[2][2] = 0.0;
6352  }
6353  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
6354  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++) {
6355  for (jPos = 0; jPos < nDim; jPos++)
6356  Dd[iPos] += D[iPos][jPos]*d[jPos];
6357  }
6358  }
6359 
6360  /*--- Coefficients with no explicit AoA dependece ---*/
6361 
6362  else {
6363  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
6364  }
6365 
6366  for (iPos = 0; iPos < nDim; iPos++)
6367  Sens_AoA[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
6368 
6369  /*--- Pressure sensitivity ---*/
6370 
6371  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = -(1/p)*d[iPos];
6372  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++)
6373  Sens_Press[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
6374 
6375  /*--- Temperature sensitivity ---*/
6376 
6377  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++) Dd[iPos] = 0.0;
6378  for (iPos = 0; iPos<nDim; iPos++)
6379  Sens_Temp[iMarker] += p*Dd[iPos]*Area*UnitNormal[iPos];
6380 
6381  }
6382  }
6383 
6384  Total_Sens_Mach += Sens_Mach[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6385  Total_Sens_AoA += Sens_AoA[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6386  Total_Sens_Press += Sens_Press[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6387  Total_Sens_Temp += Sens_Temp[iMarker] * scale * factor;
6388 
6389  }
6390  }
6391  }
6392 
6393 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
6394 
6395  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Geo = Total_Sens_Geo; Total_Sens_Geo = 0.0;
6396  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Mach = Total_Sens_Mach; Total_Sens_Mach = 0.0;
6397  su2double MyTotal_Sens_AoA = Total_Sens_AoA; Total_Sens_AoA = 0.0;
6398  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Press = Total_Sens_Press; Total_Sens_Press = 0.0;
6399  su2double MyTotal_Sens_Temp = Total_Sens_Temp; Total_Sens_Temp = 0.0;
6400 
6401  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Geo, &Total_Sens_Geo, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6402  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Mach, &Total_Sens_Mach, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6403  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_AoA, &Total_Sens_AoA, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6404  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Press, &Total_Sens_Press, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6405  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&MyTotal_Sens_Temp, &Total_Sens_Temp, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
6406 
6407 #endif
6408 
6409  delete [] USens;
6410  delete [] UnitNormal;
6411  delete [] normal_grad_vel;
6412  delete [] tang_deriv_psi5;
6413  delete [] tang_deriv_T;
6414  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6415  delete [] Sigma[iDim];
6416  delete [] Sigma;
6417  delete [] normal_grad_gridvel;
6418  delete [] normal_grad_v_ux;
6419  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6420  delete [] Sigma_Psi5v[iDim];
6421  delete [] Sigma_Psi5v;
6422  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6423  delete tau[iDim];
6424  delete [] tau;
6425  delete [] Velocity;
6426 
6427 }
6428 
6429 void CAdjNSSolver::BC_HeatFlux_Wall(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
6430 
6431  unsigned short iDim, iVar, jVar, jDim;
6432  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, total_index, Point_Normal;
6433 
6434  su2double *d, l1psi, vartheta, Sigma_5, **PsiVar_Grad, phi[3];
6435  su2double sq_vel, ProjGridVel, Enthalpy = 0.0, *GridVel;
6436  su2double ViscDens, XiDens, Density, Pressure = 0.0, dPhiE_dn;
6437  su2double Laminar_Viscosity = 0.0, Eddy_Viscosity = 0.0;
6438  su2double Sigma_xx, Sigma_yy, Sigma_zz, Sigma_xy, Sigma_xz, Sigma_yz;
6439  su2double Sigma_xx5, Sigma_yy5, Sigma_zz5, Sigma_xy5, Sigma_xz5;
6440  su2double Sigma_yz5, eta_xx, eta_yy, eta_zz, eta_xy, eta_xz, eta_yz;
6441  su2double *Coord_i, *Coord_j, dist_ij_2;
6442  su2double dSigmaxx_phi1, dSigmayy_phi1, dSigmazz_phi1, dSigmaxy_phi1, dSigmaxz_phi1, dSigmayz_phi1;
6443  su2double dSigmaxx_phi2, dSigmayy_phi2, dSigmazz_phi2, dSigmaxy_phi2, dSigmaxz_phi2, dSigmayz_phi2;
6444  su2double dSigmaxx_phi3, dSigmayy_phi3, dSigmazz_phi3, dSigmaxy_phi3, dSigmaxz_phi3, dSigmayz_phi3;
6445  su2double dSigma5_psi5;
6446 
6447  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
6448  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
6449  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
6450  bool freesurface = (config->GetKind_Regime() == FREESURFACE);
6451  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
6452 
6453  su2double Prandtl_Lam = config->GetPrandtl_Lam();
6454  su2double Prandtl_Turb = config->GetPrandtl_Turb();
6455 
6456  su2double *Psi = new su2double[nVar];
6457  su2double **Tau = new su2double*[nDim];
6458  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6459  Tau[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
6460  su2double *Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
6461  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
6462  su2double *Edge_Vector = new su2double[nDim];
6463  su2double **GradPhi = new su2double*[nDim];
6464  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6465  GradPhi[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
6466  su2double *GradPsiE = new su2double [nDim];
6467 
6468  /*--- Loop over all of the vertices on this boundary marker ---*/
6469 
6470  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
6471 
6472  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
6473 
6474  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
6475 
6476  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
6477 
6478  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
6479 
6480  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
6481  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
6482 
6483  /*--- Initialize the convective & viscous residuals to zero ---*/
6484 
6485  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
6486  Res_Conv_i[iVar] = 0.0; Res_Visc_i[iVar] = 0.0;
6487  if (implicit) { for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar ++) Jacobian_ii[iVar][jVar] = 0.0; }
6488  }
6489 
6490  /*--- Retrieve adjoint solution at the wall boundary node ---*/
6491 
6492  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
6493  Psi[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
6494 
6495  /*--- Get the force projection vector (based on the objective function) ---*/
6496 
6497  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
6498 
6499  /*--- Set the adjoint velocity BC ---*/
6500 
6501  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) { phi[iDim] = d[iDim]; }
6502 
6503  /*--- Correct the adjoint velocity BC for dynamic meshes ---*/
6504 
6505  if (grid_movement) {
6506  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
6507  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6508  phi[iDim] -= Psi[nDim+1]*GridVel[iDim];
6509  }
6510 
6511  /*--- Impose the value of the adjoint velocity as a strong boundary
6512  condition (Dirichlet). Fix the adjoint velocity and remove any addtional
6513  contribution to the residual at this node. ---*/
6514 
6515  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6516  node[iPoint]->SetSolution_Old(iDim+1, phi[iDim]);
6517 
6518  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6519  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint, iDim+1);
6520  node[iPoint]->SetVel_ResTruncError_Zero();
6521 
6522  /*--- Compute additional contributions to the adjoint density and energy
6523  equations which will be added to the residual (weak imposition) ---*/
6524 
6525  if (compressible) {
6526 
6527  /*--- Energy residual due to the convective term ---*/
6528 
6529  l1psi = 0.0;
6530  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6531  l1psi += Normal[iDim]*d[iDim];
6532  Res_Conv_i[nDim+1] = l1psi*Gamma_Minus_One;
6533 
6534  /*--- Flux contribution and Jacobian contributions for moving
6535  walls. Note that these are only for the adjoint density and
6536  adjoint energy equations (the adjoint vel. uses a strong BC). ---*/
6537 
6538  if (grid_movement) {
6539 
6540  /*--- Get the grid velocity at this node and impose v = u_wall ---*/
6541 
6542  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
6543  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Velocity[iDim] = GridVel[iDim];
6544 
6545  /*--- Get some additional quantities from the flow solution ---*/
6546 
6547  Density = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDensity();
6548  if (compressible) {
6549  Pressure = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure();
6550  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
6551  Laminar_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLaminarViscosity();
6552  Eddy_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEddyViscosity(); // Should be zero at the wall
6553  }
6554  if (incompressible || freesurface) {
6555  Pressure = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressureInc();
6556  Laminar_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLaminarViscosityInc();
6557  Eddy_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEddyViscosityInc(); // Should be zero at the wall
6558  }
6559 
6560  ViscDens = (Laminar_Viscosity + Eddy_Viscosity) / Density;
6561  XiDens = Gamma * (Laminar_Viscosity/Prandtl_Lam + Eddy_Viscosity/Prandtl_Turb) / Density;
6562 
6563  /*--- Compute projections, velocity squared divided by two, and
6564  other inner products. Note that we are imposing v = u_wall from
6565  the direct problem and that phi = d - \psi_5 * v ---*/
6566 
6567  ProjGridVel = 0.0; sq_vel = 0.0;
6568  vartheta = Psi[0] + Psi[nDim+1]*Enthalpy;
6569  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6570  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
6571  sq_vel += 0.5*GridVel[iDim]*GridVel[iDim];
6572  vartheta += GridVel[iDim]*phi[iDim];
6573  }
6574 
6575  /*--- Convective flux at the wall node (adjoint density) ---*/
6576 
6577  Res_Conv_i[0] = -vartheta*ProjGridVel + l1psi*Gamma_Minus_One*sq_vel;
6578 
6579  /*--- Implicit contributions from convective part ---*/
6580 
6581  if (implicit) {
6582  Jacobian_ii[0][0] += -ProjGridVel;
6583  Jacobian_ii[0][nVar-1] += -ProjGridVel * Enthalpy;
6584  }
6585 
6586  /*--- Viscous flux contributions at the wall node. Impose dPhiE_dn = 0
6587  (adiabatic walls with frozen viscosity). ---*/
6588 
6589  dPhiE_dn = 0.0;
6590 
6591  /*--- Store the adjoint velocity and energy gradients for clarity ---*/
6592 
6593  PsiVar_Grad = node[iPoint]->GetGradient();
6594  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6595  GradPsiE[iDim] = PsiVar_Grad[nVar-1][iDim];
6596  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
6597  GradPhi[iDim][jDim] = PsiVar_Grad[iDim+1][jDim];
6598  }
6599 
6600  if (nDim == 2) {
6601 
6602  /*--- Compute the adjoint stress tensor ---*/
6603 
6604  Sigma_xx = ViscDens * (FOUR3 * GradPhi[0][0] - TWO3 * GradPhi[1][1]);
6605  Sigma_yy = ViscDens * (-TWO3 * GradPhi[0][0] + FOUR3 * GradPhi[1][1]);
6606  Sigma_xy = ViscDens * (GradPhi[1][0] + GradPhi[0][1]);
6607  Sigma_xx5 = ViscDens * ( FOUR3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] - TWO3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1]);
6608  Sigma_yy5 = ViscDens * (- TWO3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] + FOUR3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1]);
6609  Sigma_xy5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[1] + Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[0]);
6610  Sigma_5 = XiDens * dPhiE_dn;
6611  eta_xx = Sigma_xx + Sigma_xx5;
6612  eta_yy = Sigma_yy + Sigma_yy5;
6613  eta_xy = Sigma_xy + Sigma_xy5;
6614 
6615  /*--- Viscous flux at the wall node (adjoint density & energy only) ---*/
6616 
6617  Res_Visc_i[0] = - (Velocity[0] * Normal[0] * eta_xx + Velocity[1] * Normal[1] * eta_yy
6618  + (Velocity[0] * Normal[1] + Velocity[1] * Normal[0]) * eta_xy
6619  - (sq_vel - Pressure/(Density*Gamma_Minus_One)) * Sigma_5);
6620  Res_Visc_i[nDim+1] = Sigma_5;
6621 
6622  /*--- Computation of the Jacobians at Point i---*/
6623 
6624  if (implicit) {
6625 
6626  /*--- Compute closest normal neighbor ---*/
6627 
6628  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
6629 
6630  /*--- Get coordinates of i & nearest normal and compute distance ---*/
6631 
6632  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
6633  Coord_j = geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord();
6634  dist_ij_2 = 0.0;
6635  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6636  Edge_Vector[iDim] = Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim];
6637  dist_ij_2 += Edge_Vector[iDim]*Edge_Vector[iDim];
6638  }
6639 
6640  dSigmaxx_phi1 = -FOUR3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6641  dSigmaxx_phi2 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6642  dSigmayy_phi1 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6643  dSigmayy_phi2 = -FOUR3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6644  dSigmaxy_phi1 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6645  dSigmaxy_phi2 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6646 
6647 // dSigmaxx5_psi5 = -ViscDens * ( FOUR3*Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[0] - TWO3*Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[1] )/dist_ij_2;
6648 // dSigmayy5_psi5 = -ViscDens * (- TWO3*Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[0] + FOUR3*Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[1] )/dist_ij_2;
6649 // dSigmaxy5_psi5 = -ViscDens * ( Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[1] + Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[0] )/dist_ij_2;
6650  dSigma5_psi5 = -XiDens * ( Edge_Vector[0]*Normal[0] + Edge_Vector[1]*Normal[1] )/dist_ij_2;
6651 
6652  Jacobian_ii[0][0] += 0.0;
6653  Jacobian_ii[0][1] += -( Velocity[0]*Normal[0]*dSigmaxx_phi1 + Velocity[1]*Normal[1]*dSigmayy_phi1
6654  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxy_phi1 );
6655  Jacobian_ii[0][2] += -( Velocity[0]*Normal[0]*dSigmaxx_phi2 + Velocity[1]*Normal[1]*dSigmayy_phi2
6656  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxy_phi2 );
6657  Jacobian_ii[0][3] += (sq_vel - Pressure/(Density*Gamma_Minus_One)) * dSigma5_psi5;
6658 
6659  Jacobian_ii[3][0] += 0.0;
6660  Jacobian_ii[3][1] += 0.0;
6661  Jacobian_ii[3][2] += 0.0;
6662  Jacobian_ii[3][3] += dSigma5_psi5;
6663 
6664  }
6665 
6666 
6667  } else if (nDim == 3) {
6668 
6669  /*--- Compute the adjoint stress tensor ---*/
6670  Sigma_xx = ViscDens * (FOUR3 * GradPhi[0][0] - TWO3 * GradPhi[1][1] - TWO3 * GradPhi[2][2]);
6671  Sigma_yy = ViscDens * (-TWO3 * GradPhi[0][0] + FOUR3 * GradPhi[1][1] - TWO3 * GradPhi[2][2]);
6672  Sigma_zz = ViscDens * (-TWO3 * GradPhi[0][0] - TWO3 * GradPhi[1][1] + FOUR3 * GradPhi[2][2]);
6673  Sigma_xy = ViscDens * (GradPhi[1][0] + GradPhi[0][1]);
6674  Sigma_xz = ViscDens * (GradPhi[2][0] + GradPhi[0][2]);
6675  Sigma_yz = ViscDens * (GradPhi[2][1] + GradPhi[1][2]);
6676  Sigma_xx5 = ViscDens * ( FOUR3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] - TWO3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1] - TWO3 * Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[2]);
6677  Sigma_yy5 = ViscDens * (- TWO3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] + FOUR3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1] - TWO3 * Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[2]);
6678  Sigma_zz5 = ViscDens * (- TWO3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] - TWO3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1] + FOUR3 * Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[2]);
6679  Sigma_xy5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[1] + Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[0]);
6680  Sigma_xz5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[2] + Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[0]);
6681  Sigma_yz5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[2] + Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[1]);
6682  Sigma_5 = XiDens * dPhiE_dn;
6683  eta_xx = Sigma_xx + Sigma_xx5; eta_yy = Sigma_yy + Sigma_yy5; eta_zz = Sigma_zz + Sigma_zz5;
6684  eta_xy = Sigma_xy + Sigma_xy5; eta_xz = Sigma_xz + Sigma_xz5; eta_yz = Sigma_yz + Sigma_yz5;
6685 
6686  /*--- Viscous flux at the wall node (adjoint density & energy only) ---*/
6687 
6688  Res_Visc_i[0] = - (Velocity[0] * Normal[0] * eta_xx + Velocity[1] * Normal[1] * eta_yy + Velocity[2] * Normal[2] * eta_zz
6689  + (Velocity[0] * Normal[1] + Velocity[1] * Normal[0]) * eta_xy
6690  + (Velocity[0] * Normal[2] + Velocity[2] * Normal[0]) * eta_xz
6691  + (Velocity[2] * Normal[1] + Velocity[1] * Normal[2]) * eta_yz
6692  - (sq_vel - Pressure/(Density*Gamma_Minus_One)) * Sigma_5);
6693  Res_Visc_i[nDim+1] = Sigma_5;
6694 
6695  /*--- Computation of the Jacobians at Point i---*/
6696 
6697  if (implicit) {
6698 
6699  /*--- Compute closest normal neighbor ---*/
6700 
6701  Point_Normal = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal_Neighbor();
6702 
6703  /*--- Get coordinates of i & nearest normal and compute distance ---*/
6704 
6705  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
6706  Coord_j = geometry->node[Point_Normal]->GetCoord();
6707  dist_ij_2 = 0.0;
6708  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6709  Edge_Vector[iDim] = Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim];
6710  dist_ij_2 += Edge_Vector[iDim]*Edge_Vector[iDim];
6711  }
6712 
6713  dSigmaxx_phi1 = -FOUR3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6714  dSigmaxx_phi2 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6715  dSigmaxx_phi3 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[2]/dist_ij_2;
6716  dSigmayy_phi1 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6717  dSigmayy_phi2 = -FOUR3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6718  dSigmayy_phi3 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[2]/dist_ij_2;
6719  dSigmazz_phi1 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6720  dSigmazz_phi2 = TWO3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6721  dSigmazz_phi3 = -FOUR3 * ViscDens * Edge_Vector[2]/dist_ij_2;
6722  dSigmaxy_phi1 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6723  dSigmaxy_phi2 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6724  dSigmaxy_phi3 = 0;
6725  dSigmaxz_phi1 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[2]/dist_ij_2;
6726  dSigmaxz_phi2 = 0;
6727  dSigmaxz_phi3 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[0]/dist_ij_2;
6728  dSigmayz_phi1 = 0;
6729  dSigmayz_phi2 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[2]/dist_ij_2;
6730  dSigmayz_phi3 = -ViscDens * Edge_Vector[1]/dist_ij_2;
6731 
6732 // dSigmaxx5_psi5 = -ViscDens * ( FOUR3*Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[0] - TWO3*Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[1] - TWO3*Velocity[2]*Edge_Vector[2])/dist_ij_2;
6733 // dSigmayy5_psi5 = -ViscDens * (- TWO3*Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[0] + FOUR3*Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[1] - TWO3*Velocity[2]*Edge_Vector[2])/dist_ij_2;
6734 // dSigmazz5_psi5 = -ViscDens * (- TWO3*Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[0] - TWO3*Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[1] + FOUR3*Velocity[2]*Edge_Vector[2])/dist_ij_2;
6735 // dSigmaxy5_psi5 = -ViscDens * ( Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[1] + Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[0] )/dist_ij_2;
6736 // dSigmaxz5_psi5 = -ViscDens * ( Velocity[0]*Edge_Vector[2] + Velocity[2]*Edge_Vector[0] )/dist_ij_2;
6737 // dSigmayz5_psi5 = -ViscDens * ( Velocity[1]*Edge_Vector[2] + Velocity[2]*Edge_Vector[1] )/dist_ij_2;
6738  dSigma5_psi5 = -XiDens * ( Edge_Vector[0]*Normal[0] + Edge_Vector[1]*Normal[1] + Edge_Vector[2]*Normal[2] )/dist_ij_2;
6739 
6740  Jacobian_ii[0][0] += 0.0;
6741  Jacobian_ii[0][1] += -( Velocity[0]*Normal[0]*dSigmaxx_phi1 + Velocity[1]*Normal[1]*dSigmayy_phi1 + Velocity[2]*Normal[2]*dSigmazz_phi1
6742  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxy_phi1
6743  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[2] + Velocity[2]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxz_phi1
6744  + (Velocity[2]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[2])*dSigmayz_phi1 );
6745  Jacobian_ii[0][2] += -( Velocity[0]*Normal[0]*dSigmaxx_phi2 + Velocity[1]*Normal[1]*dSigmayy_phi2 + Velocity[2]*Normal[2]*dSigmazz_phi2
6746  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxy_phi2
6747  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[2] + Velocity[2]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxz_phi2
6748  + (Velocity[2]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[2])*dSigmayz_phi2 );
6749  Jacobian_ii[0][3] += -( Velocity[0]*Normal[0]*dSigmaxx_phi3 + Velocity[1]*Normal[1]*dSigmayy_phi3 + Velocity[2]*Normal[2]*dSigmazz_phi3
6750  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxy_phi3
6751  + (Velocity[0]*Normal[2] + Velocity[2]*Normal[0])*dSigmaxz_phi3
6752  + (Velocity[2]*Normal[1] + Velocity[1]*Normal[2])*dSigmayz_phi3 );
6753  Jacobian_ii[0][4] += (sq_vel - Pressure/(Density*Gamma_Minus_One)) * dSigma5_psi5;
6754 
6755  Jacobian_ii[4][0] += 0.0;
6756  Jacobian_ii[4][1] += 0.0;
6757  Jacobian_ii[4][2] += 0.0;
6758  Jacobian_ii[4][3] += 0.0;
6759  Jacobian_ii[4][4] += dSigma5_psi5;
6760 
6761  }
6762  }
6763  }
6764  }
6765 
6766  if (incompressible || freesurface) {
6767 
6768  /*--- Pressure residual due to the convective term ---*/
6769 
6770  l1psi = 0.0;
6771  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6772  l1psi += Normal[iDim]*d[iDim];
6773  Res_Conv_i[0] = l1psi;
6774  }
6775 
6776  /*--- Convective contribution to the residual at the wall ---*/
6777 
6778  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
6779 
6780  /*--- Viscous contribution to the residual at the wall ---*/
6781 
6782  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Visc_i);
6783 
6784  /*--- Enforce the no-slip boundary condition in a strong way by
6785  modifying the velocity-rows of the Jacobian (1 on the diagonal). ---*/
6786 
6787  if (implicit) {
6788  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
6789  for (iVar = 1; iVar <= nDim; iVar++) {
6790  total_index = iPoint*nVar+iVar;
6791  Jacobian.DeleteValsRowi(total_index);
6792  }
6793  }
6794 
6795  }
6796 
6797  }
6798 
6799  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6800  delete [] Tau[iDim];
6801  delete [] Tau;
6802  delete [] Psi;
6803  delete [] Velocity;
6804  delete [] Normal;
6805  delete [] Edge_Vector;
6806  delete [] GradPsiE;
6807  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6808  delete [] GradPhi[iDim];
6809  delete [] GradPhi;
6810 
6811 }
6812 
6813 
6814 void CAdjNSSolver::BC_Isothermal_Wall(CGeometry *geometry, CSolver **solver_container, CNumerics *conv_numerics, CNumerics *visc_numerics, CConfig *config, unsigned short val_marker) {
6815 
6816  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint, total_index;
6817  unsigned short iDim, iVar, jVar, jDim;
6818  su2double *d, q, *U, l1psi, dVisc_T, rho, pressure, div_phi,
6819  force_stress, Sigma_5, **PsiVar_Grad, phi[3] = {0.0,0.0,0.0};
6820  su2double phis1, phis2, sq_vel, ProjVel, Enthalpy, *GridVel, phi_u, d_n;
6821  su2double Energy, ViscDens, XiDens, Density, SoundSpeed, Pressure, dPhiE_dn, Laminar_Viscosity, Eddy_Viscosity,
6822  Sigma_xx, Sigma_yy, Sigma_zz, Sigma_xy, Sigma_xz, Sigma_yz,
6823  Sigma_xx5, Sigma_yy5, Sigma_zz5, Sigma_xy5, Sigma_xz5,
6824  Sigma_yz5, eta_xx, eta_yy, eta_zz, eta_xy, eta_xz, eta_yz;
6825  su2double kGTdotn=0.0, Area=0.0, Xi=0.0;
6826 
6827  su2double *Psi = new su2double[nVar];
6828  su2double **Tau = new su2double* [nDim];
6829  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6830  Tau[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
6831  su2double *Velocity = new su2double[nDim];
6832  su2double *Normal = new su2double[nDim];
6833 
6834  su2double **GradPhi = new su2double* [nDim];
6835  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6836  GradPhi[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
6837  su2double *GradPsiE = new su2double [nDim];
6838  su2double *GradT;// = new su2double[nDim];
6839  su2double *GradP;
6840  su2double *GradDens;
6841  su2double *dPoRho2 = new su2double[nDim];
6842 
6843  bool implicit = (config->GetKind_TimeIntScheme_AdjFlow() == EULER_IMPLICIT);
6844  bool compressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == COMPRESSIBLE);
6845  bool incompressible = (config->GetKind_Regime() == INCOMPRESSIBLE);
6846  bool grid_movement = config->GetGrid_Movement();
6847  bool heat_flux_obj = ((config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == TOTAL_HEATFLUX) ||
6848  (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == MAXIMUM_HEATFLUX) ||
6849  (config->GetKind_ObjFunc() == INVERSE_DESIGN_HEATFLUX));
6850 
6851  su2double Prandtl_Lam = config->GetPrandtl_Lam();
6852  su2double Prandtl_Turb = config->GetPrandtl_Turb();
6853  su2double Gas_Constant = config->GetGas_ConstantND();
6854  su2double Cp = (Gamma / Gamma_Minus_One) * Gas_Constant;
6855  su2double Thermal_Conductivity;
6856  su2double invrho3;
6857  su2double Volume;
6858  su2double mu2;
6859  su2double gpsiAv2;
6860  su2double gpsi5n;
6861 
6862  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[val_marker]; iVertex++) {
6863 
6864  iPoint = geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNode();
6865 
6866  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
6867 
6868  /*--- Initialize the convective & viscous residuals to zero ---*/
6869  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
6870  Res_Conv_i[iVar] = 0.0;
6871  Res_Visc_i[iVar] = 0.0;
6872  if (implicit) {
6873  for (jVar = 0; jVar < nVar; jVar ++)
6874  Jacobian_ii[iVar][jVar] = 0.0;
6875  }
6876  }
6877 
6878  /*--- Retrieve adjoint solution at the wall boundary node ---*/
6879  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
6880  Psi[iVar] = node[iPoint]->GetSolution(iVar);
6881 
6882  /*--- Normal vector for this vertex (negate for outward convention) ---*/
6883  geometry->vertex[val_marker][iVertex]->GetNormal(Normal);
6884  Volume = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
6885  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Normal[iDim] = -Normal[iDim];
6886 
6887  /*--- Get the force projection vector (based on the objective function) ---*/
6888  d = node[iPoint]->GetForceProj_Vector();
6889 
6890  /*--- Adjustments to strong boundary condition for dynamic meshes ---*/
6891  if ( grid_movement) {
6892  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
6893  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6894  phi[iDim] = d[iDim] - Psi[nVar-1]*GridVel[iDim];
6895  }
6896  } else {
6897  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6898  phi[iDim] = d[iDim];
6899  }
6900  }
6901 
6902  /*--- Strong BC imposition for the adjoint velocity equations ---*/
6903  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6904  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint, iDim+1);
6905  node[iPoint]->SetVel_ResTruncError_Zero();
6906  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6907  node[iPoint]->SetSolution_Old(iDim+1, phi[iDim]);
6908  if (implicit) {
6909  for (iVar = 1; iVar <= nDim; iVar++) {
6910  total_index = iPoint*nVar+iVar;
6911  Jacobian.DeleteValsRowi(total_index);
6912  }
6913  }
6914 
6915  /*--- Get transport coefficient information ---*/
6916  Laminar_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLaminarViscosity();
6917  Eddy_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEddyViscosity();
6918  Thermal_Conductivity = Cp * ( Laminar_Viscosity/Prandtl_Lam
6919  +Eddy_Viscosity/Prandtl_Turb);
6920 
6921 // GradV = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive();
6922 
6923  /*--- Calculate Dirichlet condition for energy equation ---*/
6924  if (!heat_flux_obj) {
6925  q = 0.0;
6926  }
6927  else {
6928 
6929  Area = 0.0;
6930  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) Area += Normal[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
6931  Area = sqrt(Area);
6932 
6933  /* --- Temperature gradient term ---*/
6934  GradT = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive()[0];
6935  kGTdotn = 0.0;
6936  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6937  kGTdotn += Cp * Laminar_Viscosity/Prandtl_Lam*GradT[iDim]*Normal[iDim]/Area;
6938  // Cp * Viscosity/Prandtl_Lam matches term used in solver_direct_mean
6939  /*--- constant term to multiply max heat flux objective ---*/
6940  Xi = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->GetTotal_HeatFlux(); // versions for max heat flux
6941  Xi = pow(Xi, 1.0/pnorm-1.0)/pnorm;
6942 
6943  /*--- Boundary condition value ---*/
6944  q = Xi * pnorm * pow(kGTdotn, pnorm-1.0)*Area;
6945  }
6946 
6947  /*--- Strong BC enforcement of the energy equation ---*/
6948  LinSysRes.SetBlock_Zero(iPoint, nVar-1);
6949  node[iPoint]->SetEnergy_ResTruncError_Zero();
6950  node[iPoint]->SetSolution_Old(nDim+1, q);
6951  if (implicit) {
6952  iVar = nDim+1;
6953  total_index = iPoint*nVar+iVar;
6954  Jacobian.DeleteValsRowi(total_index);
6955  }
6956 
6957  /*--- Additional contributions to adjoint density (weak imposition) ---*/
6958  if (compressible) {
6959 
6960  /*--- Acquire gradient information ---*/
6961  PsiVar_Grad = node[iPoint]->GetGradient();
6962  GradP = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive()[nVar-1];
6963  GradDens = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetGradient_Primitive()[nVar];
6964 
6965  /*--- Acqure flow information ---*/
6966  rho = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDensity();
6967  pressure = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure();
6968  invrho3 = (1.0/rho)*(1.0/rho)*(1.0/rho);
6969 
6970  /*--- Calculate supporting quantities ---*/
6971  mu2 = Thermal_Conductivity/Cp;
6972  gpsiAv2 = 0.0;
6973  gpsi5n = 0.0;
6974  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6975  dPoRho2[iDim] = (GradP[iDim]*rho - 2.0*GradDens[iDim]*pressure)*invrho3;
6976  gpsiAv2 += -mu2*Gamma/Gamma_Minus_One * PsiVar_Grad[nVar-1][iDim]*dPoRho2[iDim];
6977  gpsi5n += PsiVar_Grad[nVar-1][iDim]*Normal[iDim];
6978  }
6979 
6980  /*--- Apply first order term to boundary ---*/
6981  Res_Conv_i[0] = gpsiAv2*Volume;
6982 
6983  /*--- Apply second order term to boundary ---*/
6984  Res_Visc_i[0] = -mu2*Gamma/(rho*Gamma_Minus_One)*(pressure/rho)*gpsi5n;
6985 
6986  /*--- Components of the effective and adjoint stress tensors ---*/
6987  PsiVar_Grad = node[iPoint]->GetGradient();
6988  div_phi = 0;
6989  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
6990  div_phi += PsiVar_Grad[iDim+1][iDim];
6991  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
6992  Tau[iDim][jDim] = (PsiVar_Grad[iDim+1][jDim]+PsiVar_Grad[jDim+1][iDim]);
6993  }
6994  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
6995  Tau[iDim][iDim] -= TWO3*div_phi;
6996 
6997  /*--- force_stress = n_i \Tau_{ij} d_j ---*/
6998  force_stress = 0.0;
6999  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7000  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
7001  force_stress += Normal[iDim]*Tau[iDim][jDim]*d[jDim];
7002 
7003  /*--- \partial \mu_dyn \partial T ---*/
7004 // mu_dyn = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLaminarViscosity();
7005 // Temp = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetTemperature();
7006  dVisc_T = 0.0; // dVisc_T = mu_dyn*(Temp+3.0*mu2)/(2.0*Temp*(Temp+mu2));
7007 
7008  /*--- \Sigma_5 Check Area computation for Res_Conv[0] ---*/
7009  Sigma_5 = (Gamma/Cp)*dVisc_T*force_stress;
7010 
7011  /*--- Imposition of residuals ---*/
7012  rho = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetDensity();
7013  pressure = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetPressure();
7014  Res_Conv_i[0] = pressure*Sigma_5/(Gamma_Minus_One*rho*rho);
7015 
7016  /*--- Flux contribution and Jacobian contributions for moving
7017  walls. Note that these are only for the adjoint density and
7018  adjoint energy equations (the adjoint vel. uses a strong BC). ---*/
7019  if (grid_movement) {
7020 
7021  /*--- Get the appropriate grid velocity at this node ---*/
7022  GridVel = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
7023 
7024  /*--- Get the enthalpy from the direct solution ---*/
7025  Enthalpy = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEnthalpy();
7026 
7027  /*--- Compute projections, velocity squared divided by two, and
7028  other inner products. Note that we are imposing v = u_wall from
7029  the direct problem and that phi = d - \psi_5 * v ---*/
7030  ProjVel = 0.0; sq_vel = 0.0; phi_u = 0.0; d_n = 0.0;
7031  phis1 = 0.0; phis2 = Psi[0] + Enthalpy * Psi[nVar-1];
7032  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7033  ProjVel += GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
7034  sq_vel += 0.5*GridVel[iDim]*GridVel[iDim];
7035  phis1 += Normal[iDim]*phi[iDim];
7036  phis2 += GridVel[iDim]*phi[iDim];
7037  phi_u += GridVel[iDim]*phi[iDim];
7038  d_n += d[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
7039  }
7040 // phis1 += ProjVel * Psi[nVar-1];
7041 
7042  /*--- Convective flux at the wall node (adjoint density & energy only) ---*/
7043 
7044  /*--- Version 1 (full) ---*/
7045  //Res_Conv_i[0] = ProjVel * Psi[0] - phis2 * ProjVel + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One * sq_vel - ProjVel*Psi[0];
7046  //Res_Conv_i[nVar-1] = ProjVel * Psi[nVar-1] + phis1 * Gamma_Minus_One - ProjVel*Psi[nVar-1];
7047 
7048  /*--- Simplified version ---*/
7049  Res_Conv_i[0] = -(Psi[0] + phi_u + Psi[nVar-1]*Enthalpy)*ProjVel + d_n*Gamma_Minus_One*sq_vel;
7050 
7051  /*--- TO DO: Implicit contributions for convective part ---*/
7052 
7053 
7054  /*--- Viscous flux contributions at the wall node ---*/
7055  U = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetSolution();
7056  Laminar_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetLaminarViscosity();
7057  Eddy_Viscosity = solver_container[FLOW_SOL]->node[iPoint]->GetEddyViscosity(); // Should be zero at the wall
7058  Density = U[0];
7059  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7060  Velocity[iDim] = GridVel[iDim];
7061  }
7062  Energy = U[nDim+1] / Density;
7063  SoundSpeed = sqrt(Gamma*Gamma_Minus_One*(Energy-sq_vel));
7064  Pressure = (SoundSpeed * SoundSpeed * Density) / Gamma;
7065  ViscDens = (Laminar_Viscosity + Eddy_Viscosity) / Density;
7066  XiDens = Gamma * (Laminar_Viscosity/Prandtl_Lam + Eddy_Viscosity/Prandtl_Turb) / Density;
7067 
7068  /*--- Average of the derivatives of the adjoint variables ---*/
7069  PsiVar_Grad = node[iPoint]->GetGradient();
7070 
7071  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
7072  GradPsiE[iDim] = PsiVar_Grad[nVar-1][iDim];
7073  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
7074  GradPhi[iDim][jDim] = PsiVar_Grad[iDim+1][jDim];
7075  }
7076 
7077  /*--- Impose dPhiE_dn = 0 (adiabatic walls with frozen viscosity). Note
7078  that this is where a different adjoint boundary condition for temperature
7079  could be imposed. ---*/
7080  dPhiE_dn = 0.0;
7081 
7082  if (nDim ==2) {
7083 
7084  /*--- Compute the adjoint stress tensor ---*/
7085  Sigma_xx = ViscDens * (FOUR3 * GradPhi[0][0] - TWO3 * GradPhi[1][1]);
7086  Sigma_yy = ViscDens * (-TWO3 * GradPhi[0][0] + FOUR3 * GradPhi[1][1]);
7087  Sigma_xy = ViscDens * (GradPhi[1][0] + GradPhi[0][1]);
7088  Sigma_xx5 = ViscDens * ( FOUR3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] - TWO3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1]);
7089  Sigma_yy5 = ViscDens * (- TWO3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] + FOUR3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1]);
7090  Sigma_xy5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[1] + Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[0]);
7091  Sigma_5 = XiDens * dPhiE_dn;
7092  eta_xx = Sigma_xx + Sigma_xx5;
7093  eta_yy = Sigma_yy + Sigma_yy5;
7094  eta_xy = Sigma_xy + Sigma_xy5;
7095 
7096  /*--- Viscous flux at the wall node (adjoint density & energy only) ---*/
7097  Res_Visc_i[0] = - (Velocity[0] * Normal[0] * eta_xx + Velocity[1] * Normal[1] * eta_yy
7098  + (Velocity[0] * Normal[1] + Velocity[1] * Normal[0]) * eta_xy
7099  - (sq_vel - Pressure/(Density*Gamma_Minus_One)) * Sigma_5);
7100  Res_Visc_i[1] = 0.0;
7101  Res_Visc_i[2] = 0.0;
7102 
7103  } else if (nDim == 3) {
7104 
7105  /*--- Compute the adjoint stress tensor ---*/
7106  Sigma_xx = ViscDens * (FOUR3 * GradPhi[0][0] - TWO3 * GradPhi[1][1] - TWO3 * GradPhi[2][2]);
7107  Sigma_yy = ViscDens * (-TWO3 * GradPhi[0][0] + FOUR3 * GradPhi[1][1] - TWO3 * GradPhi[2][2]);
7108  Sigma_zz = ViscDens * (-TWO3 * GradPhi[0][0] - TWO3 * GradPhi[1][1] + FOUR3 * GradPhi[2][2]);
7109  Sigma_xy = ViscDens * (GradPhi[1][0] + GradPhi[0][1]);
7110  Sigma_xz = ViscDens * (GradPhi[2][0] + GradPhi[0][2]);
7111  Sigma_yz = ViscDens * (GradPhi[2][1] + GradPhi[1][2]);
7112  Sigma_xx5 = ViscDens * ( FOUR3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] - TWO3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1] - TWO3 * Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[2]);
7113  Sigma_yy5 = ViscDens * (- TWO3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] + FOUR3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1] - TWO3 * Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[2]);
7114  Sigma_zz5 = ViscDens * (- TWO3 * Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[0] - TWO3 * Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[1] + FOUR3 * Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[2]);
7115  Sigma_xy5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[1] + Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[0]);
7116  Sigma_xz5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[0] * GradPsiE[2] + Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[0]);
7117  Sigma_yz5 = ViscDens * (Velocity[1] * GradPsiE[2] + Velocity[2] * GradPsiE[1]);
7118  Sigma_5 = XiDens * dPhiE_dn;
7119  eta_xx = Sigma_xx + Sigma_xx5; eta_yy = Sigma_yy + Sigma_yy5; eta_zz = Sigma_zz + Sigma_zz5;
7120  eta_xy = Sigma_xy + Sigma_xy5; eta_xz = Sigma_xz + Sigma_xz5; eta_yz = Sigma_yz + Sigma_yz5;
7121 
7122  /*--- Viscous flux at the wall node (adjoint density & energy only) ---*/
7123  Res_Visc_i[0] = - (Velocity[0] * Normal[0] * eta_xx + Velocity[1] * Normal[1] * eta_yy + Velocity[2] * Normal[2] * eta_zz
7124  + (Velocity[0] * Normal[1] + Velocity[1] * Normal[0]) * eta_xy
7125  + (Velocity[0] * Normal[2] + Velocity[2] * Normal[0]) * eta_xz
7126  + (Velocity[2] * Normal[1] + Velocity[1] * Normal[2]) * eta_yz
7127  - (sq_vel - Pressure/(Density*Gamma_Minus_One)) * Sigma_5);
7128  Res_Visc_i[1] = 0.0;
7129  Res_Visc_i[2] = 0.0;
7130  Res_Visc_i[3] = 0.0;
7131  }
7132  }
7133  }
7134 
7135  if (incompressible) {
7136 
7137  /*--- Pressure residual due to the convective term ---*/
7138  l1psi = 0.0;
7139  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7140  l1psi += Normal[iDim]*d[iDim];
7141  Res_Conv_i[0] = l1psi;
7142 
7143  }
7144 
7145  /*--- Update convective and viscous residuals ---*/
7146  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Res_Conv_i);
7147  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(iPoint, Res_Visc_i);
7148  if (implicit) {
7149  Jacobian.SubtractBlock(iPoint, iPoint, Jacobian_ii);
7150  }
7151 
7152  }
7153 
7154  }
7155 
7156  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7157  delete [] Tau[iDim];
7158  delete [] Tau;
7159  delete [] Psi;
7160  delete [] Velocity;
7161  delete [] Normal;
7162  delete [] GradPsiE;
7163  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
7164  delete [] GradPhi[iDim];
7165  delete [] GradPhi;
7166  delete [] dPoRho2;
7167 }
7168 
MASS_FLOW
User specifies density and velocity (mass flow).
Definition: option_structure.hpp:861
CVariable::GetVelocity2
virtual su2double GetVelocity2(void)
A virtual member.
Definition: variable_structure.inl:288
CSolver::Vector
su2double * Vector
Auxiliary nDim vector.
Definition: solver_structure.hpp:93
CSolver::cvector
su2double ** cvector
Auxiliary structure for computing gradients by least-squares.
Definition: solver_structure.hpp:110
CAdjEulerSolver::Set_MPI_Solution
void Set_MPI_Solution(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config)
Impose the send-receive boundary condition.
Definition: solver_adjoint_mean.cpp:404
CConfig::GetRelaxation_Factor_AdjFlow
su2double GetRelaxation_Factor_AdjFlow(void)
Get the relaxation coefficient of the linear solver for the implicit formulation. ...
Definition: config_structure.inl:586
CAdjEulerSolver::Total_Sens_BPress
su2double Total_Sens_BPress
Total sensitivity to back pressure.
Definition: solver_structure.hpp:5612
SECOND_ORDER
Second order.
Definition: option_structure.hpp:595
CConfig::GetMarker_All_Monitoring
unsigned short GetMarker_All_Monitoring(unsigned short val_marker)
Get the monitoring information for a marker val_marker.
Definition: config_structure.inl:824
CNumerics::SetEnthalpy
void SetEnthalpy(su2double val_enthalpy_i, su2double val_enthalpy_j)
Set the value of the enthalpy.
Definition: numerics_structure.inl:389
CSolver::GetCPressure
virtual su2double GetCPressure(unsigned short val_marker, unsigned long val_vertex)
A virtual member.
Definition: solver_structure.inl:317
CSolver::Res_Conv_i
su2double * Res_Conv_i
Auxiliary vector for storing the convective residual at point i.
Definition: solver_structure.hpp:96
CNumerics::SetGridVel
void SetGridVel(su2double *val_gridvel_i, su2double *val_gridvel_j)
Set the velocity of the computational grid.
Definition: numerics_structure.inl:354
VERB_HIGH
High level of verbosity.
Definition: option_structure.hpp:167
CConfig::GetInflow_Pressure
su2double GetInflow_Pressure(string val_marker)
Get the back pressure (static) at an outlet boundary.
Definition: config_structure.cpp:5394
CGeometry::GetnEdge
unsigned long GetnEdge(void)
Get number of edges.
Definition: geometry_structure.inl:154
CConfig::GetGas_ConstantND
su2double GetGas_ConstantND(void)
Get the value of specific gas constant.
Definition: config_structure.inl:180
INTERFACE_BOUNDARY
